title: 改装駆逐艦「天津風改二」、抜錨せよ！Remodeled Destroyer "Amatsukaze Kai Ni", Set Sail!
description: Deploy a fleet with the remodeled destroyer Amatsukaze Kai Ni as flagship to Okinoshima in the Nansei Islands Sea, Peacock Island in the northern part of the Central Sea, Sav Island as well as the Salmon Area in the Southern Sea, and the Shounan Mainland Route in the South-Western Sea! Destroy the enemy forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Amatsukaze Kai Ni as flagship, and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 7-4, 5-3, 5-4, 6-4.

title: 「十六駆」演習！"16th Squadron" Exercises!
description: 駆逐隊演習：第十六駆逐隊「天津風」「雪風」「時津風」「初風」のうち2隻以上を含む演習艦隊を編成。同演習艦隊で本日中に演習【S判定】勝利3回以上を達成せよ！　いい風きてる？十六駆、演習開始！
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 2 of: "Amatsukaze, Yukikaze, Tokitsukaze, or Hatsukaze"; and up to 4 XX, then score 3 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 砲熕兵装の整備Artillery Armament Maintenance
description: Arsenal Quest:
requirement: Scrap 18 "Small Caliber Main Guns", 12 "Medium Caliber Main Guns", and 6 "Depth Charges", and prepare 1 Emergency Repair Personnel, 2 500 ammo, and 3 000 steel.
notes: Resources and item are consumed upon completion.

title: 「十六駆」出撃！鎮守府海域の安全を確保せよ！"16th Squadron" Sortie! Patrol Of The Naval Base Waters!
description: [Time-Limited Quest] Conduct repeated patrols at the Coastal Refinery Zone, Nansei Islands Defense Line, and Seas Near the Naval Base with a fleet that includes at least two ships among Amatsukaze, Yukikaze, Tokitsukaze, and Hatsukaze! Secure the Naval Base Sea and prepare for any future operations!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 2 of: "Amatsukaze, Yukikaze, Tokitsukaze, or Hatsukaze"; and up to 4 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-4, and 1-5 three times each.

title: 主力オブ主力、抜錨！敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！The Main Force Of The Main Force, Set Sail! Destroy The Enemy Fleet!
description: 【期間限定任務】旗艦に戦艦級、夕雲型駆逐艦2隻以上を含む主力艦隊を編成！ 南西諸島沖、南西諸島防衛線、バシー海峡、東部オリョール海、沖ノ島海域に出撃！ 敵主力艦隊を撃滅せよ！
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 (F)BB(V) as flagship, any 2 Yuugumo-class, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-4, 2-2, 2-3, 2-4.

title: はじめての「編成」！Your First "Composition"!
description: Compose a "fleet" with 2 or more ships!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 or more ships.

title: 「駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Compose A "Destroyer Division"!
description: Compose a "Destroyer Division" made up of 4 or more destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 4 DD and up to 2 XX.

title: 「水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！Compose A "Torpedo Squadron"!
description: Compose a "Torpedo Squadron" that consists of a light cruiser flagship and multiple destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL as flagship and 5 DD.

title: 6隻編成の艦隊を編成せよ！Compose A Fleet with 6 Ships!
description: Compose a main fleet formed by 6 ships!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 6 ships.

title: 軽巡2隻を擁する隊を編成せよ！Compose A Fleet with 2 Light Cruisers!
description: Compose a high-speed fleet with 2 light cruisers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 CL.

title: 第2艦隊を編成せよ！Compose The Second Fleet!
description:
Assign the flagship for the second fleet and compose it!
Have a ship in the Second Fleet.

title: 「重巡戦隊」を編成せよ！Compose A "Heavy Cruiser Squadron"!
description: Compose a heavy cruiser squadron with 2 heavy cruisers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 CA in the First Fleet.

title: 「天龍」型軽巡姉妹の全2艦を編成せよ！Compose A Fleet With Both Tenryuu-class Light Cruiser Sisters!
description: Assign the Tenryuu-class light cruisers "Tenryuu" and "Tatsuta" to the same fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Tenryuu and Tatsuta.

title: 「水上機母艦」を配備せよ！Assign A "Seaplane Tender"!
description: Assign a "seaplane tender" capable of utilizing multiple reconnaissance seaplanes to the fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 AV.

title: 「第六駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "6th Destroyer Division"!
description: Compose the 6th Destroyer Division formed by "Akatsuki", "Hibiki", "Ikazuchi", and "Inazuma"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma.

title: 第2艦隊で空母機動部隊を編成せよ！Compose A Mobile Carrier Fleet As The Second Fleet!
description: Assign a carrier to the second fleet and compose a mobile carrier fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L), and 2 DD, in the Second Fleet.

title: 「空母機動部隊」を編成せよ！Compose A "Mobile Carrier Fleet"!
description: With 1 or more carriers as flagship, compose a mobile carrier fleet along with some escorts!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L) as Secretary, and 3 DD.

title: 戦艦と重巡による主力艦隊を編成せよ！Compose A Main Force Fleet With Battleship And Heavy Cruisers!
description: Compose a surface strike fleet with 1 or more battleships and 2 or more heavy cruisers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 (F)BB and 2 CA in the First Fleet.
notes: BBV and CAV do not count.

title: 「川内」型軽巡姉妹の全3艦を編成せよ！Compose A Fleet with All Three "Sendai-class Light Cruiser Sisters!
description: Assign the Sendai-class light cruisers "Sendai", "Jintsuu", and "Naka" to the same fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Sendai, Jintsu, and Naka in the First Fleet.

title: 「妙高」型重巡姉妹の全4隻を編成せよ！Compose A Fleet with All Four Myoukou-class Heavy Cruiser Sisters!
description: Assign the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers "Myoukou", "Nachi", "Ashigara", and "Haguro" to the same fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara, and Haguro in the First Fleet.

title: 「金剛」型による高速戦艦部隊を編成せよ！Compose A Fast Battleship Fleet With The Kongou-class!
description: Concentrate the assignment of all four Kongou-class fast battleships "Kongou", "Hiei", "Haruna", and "Kirishima".
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kongou, Hiei, Haruna, and Kirishima in the First Fleet.

title: 「扶桑」型戦艦姉妹の全2隻を編成せよ！Compose A Fleet With Both Fusou-class Battleship Sisters!
description: Assign the Fusou-class battleships "Fusou" and "Yamashiro" to the same fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fusou and Yamashiro in the First Fleet.
notes: Both BB and BBV forms can be used.

title: 「伊勢」型戦艦姉妹の全2隻を編成せよ！Compose A Fleet With Both Ise-class Battleship Sisters!
description: Assign the Ise-class battleships "Ise" and "Hyuuga" to the same fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ise and Hyuuga in the First Fleet.
notes: Both BB and BBV forms can be used.

title: 「南雲機動部隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "Nagumo Mobile Fleet"!
description: Compose the first mobile fleet consisting of "Akagi" and "Kaga" from the 1st Carrier Division as well as "Hiryuu" and "Souryuu" from the 2nd Carrier Division!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu, and Souryuu in the First Fleet.

title: 「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "Mikawa Fleet"!
description: Compose a fast fleet containing "Choukai", "Aoba", "Kako", "Furutaka", and "Tenryuu"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, and 1 FAST ship in the First Fleet.

title: 「第四戦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "4th Squadron"!
description: Compose the 4th Squadron using "Atago", "Takao", "Choukai", and "Maya" as basis!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Atago, Takao, Choukai, and Maya in the First Fleet.

title: 「西村艦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "Nishimura Fleet"!
description: Compose the Nishimura fleet using "Fusou", "Yamashiro", "Mogami", and "Shigure" as basis!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, and Shigure in the First Fleet.

title: 「第五航空戦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "5th Carrier Division"!
description: Compose the 5th Carrier Division using "Shoukaku" and "Zuikaku" as basis along with 2 destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shoukaku, Zuikaku, and 2 DD in the First Fleet.

title: 新「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The New "Mikawa Fleet"!
description: Compose the Mikawa fleet with "Choukai", "Aoba", "Kinugasa", "Kako", "Furutaka", and "Tenryuu"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu in the First Fleet.

title: 潜水艦隊を編成せよ！Compose A Submarine Fleet!
description: Compose a submarine fleet with 2 I-type submarines!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 SS(V).
notes: Despite the quest description, other SS(V) like Maruyu and foreign SS(V) can be used.

title: 航空水上打撃艦隊を編成せよ！Compose The Aviation Surface Strike Fleet!
description: Compose a fleet using 2 aviation battleships and 2 aviation cruisers as basis!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 BBV and 2 CAV in the First Fleet.

title: 中規模潜水艦隊を編成せよ！Compose A Medium-sized Submarine Fleet!
description: Compose a submarine fleet with 3 I-type submarines!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 3 SS(V).
notes: Despite the quest description, other SS(V) like Maruyu and foreign SS(V) can be used.

title: 「第六戦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "6th Squadron"!
description: Compose the 6th squadron using "Furutaka", "Kako", "Aoba", and "Kinugasa" as basis!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, and Aoba in the First Fleet.

title: 「第五艦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "5th Fleet"!
description: Compose the 5th Fleet centered around "Nachi", "Ashigara", "Tama", and "Kiso"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nachi, Ashigara, Tama, and Kiso.

title: 「第一水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "1st Torpedo Squadron"!
description: Compose the 1st Torpedo Squadron centered around "Abukuma", "Akebono", "Ushio", "Kasumi", and "Shiranui"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi, and Shiranui.

title: 「第八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "8th Destroyer Division"!
description: Compose the 8th Destroyer Division consisting of the four ships "Asashio", "Michishio", "Ooshio", and "Arashio"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, and Arashio.

title: 「第十八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "18th Destroyer Division"!
description: Compose the 18th Destroyer Division consisting of the four ships "Kasumi", "Arare", "Kagerou", and "Shiranui"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, and Shiranui.

title: 「第三十駆逐隊（第一次）」を編成せよ！Compose The "30th Destroyer Division (1st Gen.)"!
description: Compose the 30th Destroyer Division (1st Gen.) consisting of the four ships "Mutsuki", "Kisaragi", "Yayoi", and "Mochizuki"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, and Mochizuki.

title: 「第三十駆逐隊（第二次）」を編成せよ！Compose The "30th Destroyer Division (2nd Gen.)"!
description: Compose the 30th Destroyer Division (2nd Gen.) consisting of the four ships "Mutsuki", "Uzuki", "Yayoi", and "Mochizuki"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Mutsuki, Uzuki, Yayoi, and Mochizuki.

title: 「第五戦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "5th Squadron"!
description: Compose the 5th Squadron using "Myoukou", "Nachi", and "Haguro" as basis!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Myoukou, Nachi, and Haguro.

title: 新編「第二航空戦隊」を編制せよ！Compose The New "2nd Carrier Division"!
description: Compose the 2nd Carrier Division using "Hiryuu Kai Ni" (flagship) and "Souryuu" as basis (requires 2 destroyers)!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Hiryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Souryuu, and 2 DD.

title: 潜水艦隊「第六艦隊」を編制せよ！Compose The Submarine Fleet "6th Fleet"!
description: Compose the submarine fleet "6th Fleet" made up of a "submarine tender" (flagship) and multiple submarines (at least 4)!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 AS as flagship, and 4 SS(V).

title: 新型電探を配備せよ！Equip The New Radar!
description:
In order to test the new radar, assign "Myoukou Kai Ni" as the flagship of the first fleet!
Set Myoukou Kai Ni as Secretary.

title: 再編成「第二航空戦隊」を強化せよ！Strengthen The Recomposed "2nd Carrier Division"!
description: Compose the 2nd Carrier Division using "Souryuu Kai Ni" (flagship) and "Hiryuu Kai Ni" as basis (requires 2 destroyers)!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Souryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Hiryuu Kai Ni, and 2 DD.

title: 精鋭「第三戦隊」全艦集結せよ！Gather The Elite "3rd Squadron"!
description: Gather all four twice-remodeled Kongou-class fast battleships!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kongou Kai Ni, Hiei Kai Ni, Haruna Kai Ni, and Kirishima Kai Ni in the First Fleet.

title: 「新型正規空母」を配備せよ！Assign The "New-Class Standard Carrier"!
description:
Assign the 1st Unryuu-class aircraft carrier "Unryuu" as the flagship of the first fleet!
Set Unryuu as Secretary.

title: 主力戦艦部隊「第二戦隊」を編成せよ！Compose The Main Battleship Fleet "2nd Squadron"!
description: Compose the 2nd Squadron consisting of the two Nagato-class and the two Fusou-class battleships!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou, and Yamashiro in the First Fleet.

title: 戦艦を主力とした水上打撃部隊を編成せよ！Compose The Surface Strike Fleet With Battleships As Main Force!
description: Assign 3 ships from either Yamato-class, Nagato-class, Ise-class, or Fusou-class plus a light cruiser and other ships to a surface strike fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing exactly any 3 from the: "Yamato-class, Nagato-class, Ise-class, or Fusou-class"; 1 CL, and up to 2 XX.

title: 「西村艦隊」を再編成せよ！Recompose The "Nishimura Fleet"!
description: Compose the Nishimura fleet using "Fusou", "Yamashiro", "Mogami", "Shigure", and "Michishio" as basis!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, and Michishio in the First Fleet.

title: 改修工廠を準備せよ！Prepare The Improvement Arsenal!
description:
Assign the repair ship "Akashi" as the flagship of the first fleet and prepare the improvement arsenal!
Set Akashi as Secretary.

title: 軽快な「水上反撃部隊」を編成せよ！Compose A Light And Speedy "Surface Counterattack Fleet"!
description: With destroyer "Kasumi" as flagship, compose a surface raid fleet with heavy cruiser "Ashigara", a light cruiser, and 4 destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kasumi as Secretary, Ashigara, 1 CL, and 3 DD.

title: 「第十一駆逐隊」を編制せよ！Compose The "11th Destroyer Division"!
description: Compose the 11th Destroyer Division consisting of the four Type Special destroyers "Fubuki", "Shirayuki", "Hatsuyuki", and "Murakumo"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, and Murakumo in the First Fleet.

title: 「第二一駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "21st Destroyer Division"!
description: Compose the "21st Destroyer Division" consisting of "Hatsuharu", "Nenohi", "Wakaba", and "Hatsushimo"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, and Hatsushimo in the First Fleet.

title: 「第二二駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Compose The "22nd Destroyer Division"!
description: Compose the 22nd Destroyer Division consisting of four destroyers: "Satsuki", "Fumizuki", "Nagatsuki", and 1 other!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, and 1 DD in the First Fleet.

title: 「三川艦隊」を新編、突入準備せよ！Newly Compose The "Mikawa Fleet" and Prepare for Assault!
description: In the first fleet, form the Mikawa fleet with "Choukai Kai Ni" as flagship!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Choukai Kai Ni as Secretary, and any 5 of: "Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, Yuubari, or Tenryuu".

title: 「第十八戦隊」を新編成せよ！Recompose The "18th Squadron"!
description: Recompose the "18th Squadron" with at least 4 ships using light cruisers "Tenryuu" and "Tatsuta" as basis!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and 2 XX.

title: 「海上突入部隊」を編成せよ！Form The Maritime Assault Fleet!
description: Form the maritime assault fleet composed of battleships "Hiei" and "Kirishima", light cruiser "Nagara", and destroyers "Akatsuki", "Ikazuchi", and "Inazuma"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma.

title: 新編「第六駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Recompose The "6th Destroyer Division"!
description: Recompose the "6th Destroyer Division" led by "Akatsuki Kai Ni" along with "Hibiki", "Ikazuchi", and "Inazuma"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Akatsuki Kai Ni as flagship, Hibiki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma.

title: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方突入準備！Prepare "1st Torpedo Squadron" For Deployment To The Northern Sea!
description: Compose the 1st Torpedo Squadron led by "Abukuma", along with "Hibiki", "Hatsushimo", "Wakaba", "Samidare", and "Shimakaze".
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Abukuma as Secretary, Hibiki, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare, and Shimakaze.

title: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方再突入準備！Redeploy The "1st Torpedo Squadron" For The Northern Sea!
description: Recompose the 1st Torpedo Squadron led by "Abukuma", along with "Hibiki", "Yuugumo", "Naganami", "Akigumo", and "Shimakaze".
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Abukuma Kai Ni as Secretary, Hibiki, Yuugumo , Naganami, Akigumo, and Shimakaze.

title: 「第五航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！Recompose The "5th Carrier Division"!
description: Recompose the 5th Carrier Division composed of "Shoukaku", "Zuikaku" and their escorts "Oboro" and "Akigumo"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, and Akigumo in the First Fleet.

title: 新編「第二一戦隊」出撃準備！Prepare The New "21st Squadron" For Sortie!
description: Organize the 21st Squadron consisting of "Nachi Kai Ni", "Ashigara Kai Ni", "Tama", and "Kiso"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nachi Kai Ni, Ashigara Kai Ni, Tama, and Kiso in the First Fleet.

title: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！Compose The "16th Squadron (1st Gen.)"!
description: Compose the 16th Squadron (1st gen.) consisting of "Ashigara" as flagship alongside "Kuma" and "Nagara"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ashigara as Secretary, Kuma, and Nagara.

title: 「第三航空戦隊」を編成せよ！Organise The 3rd Carrier Division!
description: Compose a carrier division with "Zuikaku Kai" as flagship alongside "Zuihou", "Chitose", and "Chiyoda"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Zuikaku Kai+ as Secretary, Zuihou, Chitose Kou+, and Chiyoda Kou+.

title: 「第四航空戦隊」を編成せよ！Organise The 4th Carrier Division!
description: With "Ise Kai" and "Hyuuga Kai" as the main force, organize the 4th Carrier Division!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ise Kai+ and Hyuuga Kai+ in the First Fleet.

title: 「小沢艦隊」を編成せよ！Organise The "Ozawa Fleet"!
description: Compose the fleet consisting of the following: "Zuikaku Kai" as flagship, "Zuihou", "Chitose", "Chiyoda", "Ise Kai", and "Hyuuga Kai"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Zuikaku Kai+ as Secretary, Zuihou Kai+, Chitose Kou+, Chiyoda Kou+, Ise Kai+, and Hyuuga Kai+.

title: 新航空戦隊を編成せよ！Organise The New Carrier Division!
description: Form a new carrier division with two Shoukaku-class carriers that have finished their second remodel and some escorts!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shoukaku Kai Ni, Zuikaku Kai Ni, and 2 DD.

title: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！Organize The "16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)"!
description: Have Natori as your flagship along with Isuzu and Kinu to form the 16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Natori as flagship, Isuzu, and Kinu.

title: 「新編成航空戦隊」を編成せよ！Organize A "New Carrier Division"!
description: Form a new carrier division consisting of 2 carriers + 2 (aviation battleships or aviation cruisers) + 2 destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 CV(B/L), 2 BBV/CAV, and 2 DD.

title: 精強な「水上反撃部隊」を再編成せよ！Reorganize The Powerful "Surface Counterattack Fleet"!
description: Reorganize the surface counterattack fleet led by "Kasumi" along with "Ashigara", "Ooyodo", "Asashimo", "Kiyoshimo", and others!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, Asashimo, Ooyodo, and Kiyoshimo.

title: 「第三十一戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！Organize The "31st Squadron (1st Gen.)"!
description: Organize an anti-submarine patrol using "Isuzu Kai Ni", "Satsuki Kai Ni" and "Uzuki Kai".
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni, and Uzuki Kai.

title: 「第二七駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Organize The "27th Destroyer Division"!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of "Shiratsuyu Kai" along with "Shigure", "Harusame", and "Samidare" to form the 27th Destroyer Division!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Shiratsuyu Kai+ as flagship, Shigure, Harusame, and Samidare.

title: 強行高速輸送部隊を編成せよ！Organize The High-speed Transport Fleet.
description: Organize a torpedo squadron fleet consisting of Sendai Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni, and Kawakaze Kai Ni, along with two other destroyers in the fleet.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Sendai Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni+, Kawakaze Kai Ni, and 2 DD.

title: 編「水雷戦隊」を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！Organize The New reformed Torpedo Squadron Fleet!
description: Organize a torpedo squadron fleet consisting of 4 Destroyers and a Light Cruiser as the flagship!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL(T)/CT as flagship and 4 DD.

title: 新編「第八駆逐隊」を再編成せよ！Organize The New Reformed 8th Destroyer Division!
description: Organize the Destroyer Division consisting of Asashio Kai Ni flagship, along with Ooshio, Arashio, and Michishio!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Asashio Kai Ni as flagship, Ooshio, Arashio, and Michishio.

title: 精鋭！八駆第一小隊！Elite Force! 8th Destroyer Division First Platoon!
description: Form the Elite 8th Destroyer Division consisting of Asashio Kai Ni D as the flagship and Ooshio Kai Ni.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Asashio Kai Ni D as flagship and Ooshio Kai Ni.
notes: Asashio Kai Ni cannot be used for this quest.

title: 「第十九駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Organize The 19th Destroyer Division!
description: Organize the 19th Destroyer Division consisting of the 4 ships Ayanami, Shikinami, Uranami, and Isonami!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ayanami, Shikinami, Uranami, and Isonami.

title: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」を編成せよ！Organize The 16th Squadron (3rd Gen.)
description: Organize the 16th Squadron (3rd Gen.) consisting of Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami, and Ooi.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami, and Ooi.

title: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」を再編成せよ！Organize The "Elite 16th Squadron"!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of Kinu Kai Ni (as flagship), along include 5 of the 6 following members in your fleet, Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Aoba Kai, Kuma Kai, Shikinami Kai or Uranami Kai to organized the reformed "Elite 16th Squadron"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kinu Kai Ni as flagship, and any 5 of: "Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Aoba Kai, Kuma Kai+, Shikinami Kai+, or Uranami Kai+".

title: 新編「第一戦隊」を編成せよ！Organise The New "First Squadron"!
description: Deploy the new "First Squadron" to the first fleet with Nagato Kai Ni as the flagship and Mutsu Kai as the second ship!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nagato Kai Ni as Secretary and Mutsu Kai+ as second ship.

title: 新編「第七戦隊」を編成せよ！Organize The New "Seventh Squadron"!
description: Organization Quest: Deploy the new "Seventh Squadron" to the first fleet with Kumano Kai Ni as the flagship and Suzuya Kai Ni as the second ship, along with Mogami Kai and Mikuma Kai.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kumano Kai Ni/Kou Kai Ni as Secretary, Suzuya Kai Ni/Kou Kai Ni as second ship, Mogami Kai+, and Mikuma Kai+.

title: 精鋭「第四航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！Reorganize The Elite "Fourth Carrier Division"!
description: Organization Quest: Organize in the first fleet the two aviation battleships Ise and Hyuuga as your first and second ships with no less level 50 in experience and have 1 light cruiser and 2 destroyers to reorganize the Elite "Fourth Carrier Division"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing both Lv50+ Ise and Hyuuga, with either as Secretary and second ship, 1 CL, 2 DD, and 1XX.

title: 新編「第四水雷戦隊」を編成せよ！Organize The New 4th Torpedo Squadron!
description: Organization Quest: Deploy Yura Kai Ni as the flagship of your first fleet along with destroyers being Yuudachi, Murasame, Harusame, and Samidare along with one other destroyer to organize the New 4th Torpedo Squadron!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yura Kai Ni as Secretary, Yuudachi, Murasame, Harusame, and Samidare, and 1 DD.

title: 精鋭「第二二駆逐隊」を再編成せよ！Reorganize The Elite 22th Destroyer Squadron!
description: Composition Quest: Reorganize the 22nd Destroyer Division by forming a fleet of 4 powerful destroyers consisting of Fumizuki Kai Ni, Satsuki Kai Ni, Nagatsuki Kai, and Minazuki Kai.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fumizuki Kai Ni, Satsuki Kai Ni, Nagatsuki Kai, and Minazuki Kai.

title: 精強「任務部隊」を編成せよ！Organize The Reinforced "Task Force"
description: Composition Quest: Organize the night battle capable powerful taskforce, consisting of Saratoga Mk.II or Mod.2 as flagship along with 1 light cruiser and 2 or more destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Saratoga Mk.II/Mod.2 as Secretary, 1 CL, and 2 DD.

title: 最精鋭「第八駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Organize The Most Elite 8th Destroyer Division!
description: Organization Mission consisting of highly ranked Destroyers: Complete the composition consisting of the finest members of the new "8th Destroyer Division" consisting of the 4 Asashio-class members Asashio Kai Ni, Arashio Kai Ni, Ooshio Kai Ni, and Michishio Kai Ni!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Asashio Kai Ni, Arashio Kai Ni, Ooshio Kai Ni, and Michishio Kai Ni.

title: 「西村艦隊」第二戦隊随伴部隊、集結せよ！"Nishimura Fleet" Second Squadron Accompanying Unit, Assemble!
description: Operation Shou-Gou 1 Preparation Quest: Assemble ships to form your first attack force from Second Squadron. Organize a fleet within the 3rd fleet consisting of Mogami, Shigure, Michishio, Asagumo, and Yamagumo!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Mogami, Shigure, Michishio, Asagumo, and Yamagumo in the Third Fleet.

title: 精銳「三一駆」第一小隊、抜錨準備!Elite "31st Destroyer Division" First Platoon, Prepare To Weigh Anchor!
description: Organization Quest: Organize the 31st Destroyer Division, 1st Platoon (with 2 ships) consisting of Naganami Kai Ni as flagship along with Takanami Kai, Asashimo Kai, or Okinami Kai in the fleet.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Naganami Kai Ni as flagship, and any 1 of: "Takanami Kai+, Asashimo Kai+, or Okinami Kai+".

title: 精鋭「四水戦」抜錨準備！Elite "4th Torpedo Squadron", Prepare To Weigh Anchor!
description: 4th Torpedo Squadron (4Sd) Special Formation: Organize the Elite 4th Torpedo Squadron with Murasame Kai Ni as a flagship, along with 3 ships consisting of Yura Kai Ni, Yuudachi Kai Ni, Harusame Kai, Samidare Kai, or Akizuki Kai, and 2 other ships to form the main elite fleet that will prepare to sortie into the Southern Waters.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Murasame Kai Ni as flagship, any 3 of: "Yura Kai Ni, Yuudachi Kai Ni, Harusame Kai, Samidare Kai, or Akizuki Kai"; and 2 XX.

title: 精鋭「第二一駆逐隊」、抜錨準備！Elite "21st Destroyer Division", Prepare To Weigh Anchor!
description: Elite Destroyer Preparation Quest: Support of the Shogou One Operation. For the sake of transporting resources to front-line air bases, organize the elite 21st Destroyer Division, with 3 of the 4 members being Wakaba Kai, Hatsuharu Kai Ni, and Hatsushimo Kai Ni. Godspeed!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Wakaba Kai, Hatsuharu Kai Ni, Hatsushimo Kai Ni, and 1 DD

title: 改装「第十七駆逐隊」、再編始め！Remodelled 17th Destroyer Division, Realign!
description: Remodelled Destroyer Division Formation Quest: Reorganise the 17th Destroyer Division consisting of the remodeled Kagerō-class destroyers "Urakaze Kai", "Tanikaze Kai", and the destroyers "Isokaze B Kai" & "Hamakaze B Kai" who underwent a massive refit with a focus on anti-air equipment in order to deal with the increasing frequency of anti-air engagements!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Urakaze Kai+, Tanikaze Kai+, Isokaze B Kai+, and Hamakaze B Kai+.

title: 精鋭 「第十八駆逐隊」 を編成せよ!Form The Elite 18th Destroyer Division!
description: Elite 18th Destroyer Division Formation Quest: Organize Arare Kai Ni, Kasumi Kai Ni/B, Kagerou Kai, and Shiranui Kai into the elite 18th Destroyer Division.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Arare Kai Ni, Kasumi Kai Ni/B, Kagerou Kai+, and Shiranui Kai+.

title: 最精鋭甲型駆逐艦、集結せよ！Elite Type-A Destroyers, Assemble!
description: Type-A Destroyer Fleet Formation Quest: Form an elite fleet-type destroyer fleet consisting of Kagerou Kai Ni, Shiranui Kai Ni, and Kuroshio Kai Ni as well as three more Lv.70+ Type-A destroyers (Kagerō/Yūgumo-class destroyers)!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kagerou Kai Ni, Shiranui Kai Ni, Kuroshio Kai Ni, and 3 Lv70+ from the: "Kagerou-class or Yuugumo-class".

title: 精鋭「第十八戦隊」を再編成せよ！Reform The Elite 18th Cruiser Division!
description: Reorganizing the old-fashioned, small, remodeled light cruisers: Organize a composition consisting of the elite old-fashioned, small, remodeled light cruisers Tenryuu Kai Ni and Tatsuta Kai Ni to form the elite 18th Cruiser Division.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Tenryuu Kai Ni and Tatsuta Kai Ni.

title: 精強「第十七駆逐隊」を編成せよ！Organise The Powerful DesDiv 17!
description: Remodelled Type-A Destroyers Formation Quest: Organize the powerful DesDiv 17 consisting of 4 ships, namely Isokaze B Kai & Hamakaze B Kai, whose anti-air armaments have been substantially improved, as well as Urakaze D Kai & Tanikaze D Kai, whose ASW armaments have been improved!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Isokaze B Kai+, Hamakaze B Kai+, Urakaze D Kai+, and Tanikaze D Kai+.

title: 精鋭「第十駆逐隊」、抜錨準備！Elite DesDiv 10, Get Ready To Set Sail!
description: Type-A Destroyer Formation Quest: Form the elite DesDiv 10 (2 ships) that consists of the Yūgumo-class destroyers Yūgumo Kai Ni and Makigumo Kai Ni!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Makigumo Kai Ni and Yuugumo Kai Ni.

title: 精鋭無比「第一戦隊」抜錨準備！Unrivaled "First Squadron" PrepareTo Weigh Anchor!
description: Main Battleship Fleet Organizing Quest: Organize a fleet in the first fleet consisting of Nagato Kai Ni in the flagship position and Mutsu Kai Ni in the 2nd ship position for the ultimate elite Battleship Squadron!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nagato Kai Ni as Secretary and Mutsu Kai Ni as second ship.

title: 主力オブ主力、精強「十駆」出撃準備ヨシ！Main Force Of The Main Force, Powerful "DesDiv 10", Ready To Sortie!
description: 10th Destroyer Division Formation Quest: Organize a fleet consisting of the powerful 10th Destroyer Division consisting of the 4 destroyers: Yuugumo Kai Ni, Makigumo Kai Ni, Kazagumo Kai Ni, and Akigumo Kai Ni.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Yuugumo Kai Ni, Makigumo Kai Ni, Kazagumo Kai Ni, and Akigumo Kai Ni.

title: はじめての「出撃」！Your First "Sortie"!
description: Sortie your fleet and battle the enemy fleet!
requirement: Send a fleet on a Sortie.

title: 鎮守府正面海域を護れ！Protect The Sea In Front Of Naval Base!
description: Deploy your fleet to the Sea in Front of Naval Base and prevent the enemy fleet from advancing!
requirement: B+ rank the boss node of 1-1.

title: 第2艦隊、出撃せよ！Deploy The 2nd Fleet!
description: Deploy your newly formed "2nd fleet"!
requirement: Send the Second Fleet on a Sortie.

title: 南西諸島沖に出撃せよ！Deploy To The Sea Around Nansei Islands!
description: Deploy a fleet to the sea around the Nansei Islands and battle the enemy fleet!
requirement: Reach the boss node of 1-2.

title: 接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を迎撃せよ！Confront The "Enemy Vanguard Fleet" Closing In!
description: Spot the "Enemy Vanguard Fleet" closing in on the sea around the Nansei Islands and eliminate it!
requirement: B+ rank the boss node of 1-2.

title: 「水雷戦隊」で出撃せよ！Deploy A "Torpedo Squadron"!
description: Deploy a light cruiser-led torpedo squadron with multiple destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL as flagship, 3 DD, and up to 2 XX, then sortie on any map.

title: 「重巡洋艦」を出撃させよ！Deploy "Heavy Cruiser"!
description: Compose a fleet with a heavy cruiser as flagship and deploy it!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CA as flagship and up to 5 XX, then sortie on any map.

title: 「戦艦」を出撃させよ！Deploy "Battleship"!
description: Compose a fleet led by a battleship, the king of the seas, and deploy it!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 (F)BB as flagship and up to 5 XX, then sortie on any map.

title: 「空母機動部隊」出撃せよ！Deploy A "Mobile Carrier Fleet"!
description: Deploy a mobile carrier fleet consisting of a carrier and escorts!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L) as flagship, and 5 DD/CL/AV, then sortie on any map.

title: 敵空母を撃沈せよ！Sink An Enemy Carrier!
description: Spot the enemy mobile fleet, encounter it, and sink the enemy carrier!
requirement: Sink an enemy CV(L).

title: 「三川艦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "Mikawa Fleet"!
description: Deploy the newly formed "Mikawa Fleet"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, and 1 FAST ship, then sortie on any map.

title: 「第六駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "6th Destroyer Division"!
description: Deploy the 6th Destroyer Division consisting of "Akatsuki", "Hibiki", "Ikazuchi", and "Inazuma".
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing only Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma, and Ikazuchi, then sortie on any map.

title: 「第四戦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "4th Squadron"!
description: Eliminate the enemy fleet at the sea around Bashi Island with the 4th Squadron consisting "Atago", "Takao", "Choukai", and "Maya"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Atago, Takao, Choukai, Maya, and 2 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 2-2.

title: 「西村艦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "Nishimura Fleet"!
description: Eliminate the enemy fleet at the Orel Sea with the Nishimura Fleet consisting of "Fusou", "Yamashiro", "Mogami", and "Shigure"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, and 2 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 「第五航空戦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "5th Carrier Division"!
description: Eliminate the enemy fleet at the Moray Sea in the Northern Sea Region with the 5th Carrier fleet consisting "Shoukaku" and "Zuikaku"!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shoukaku, Zuikaku, and 4 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 3-1.

title: 新「三川艦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The New "Mikawa Fleet"!
description: With the completely reformed "Mikawa Fleet", eliminate the enemies at the Orel Sea!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu, then B+ rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 「潜水艦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "Submarine Fleet"!
description: With a fleet including 2 I-type submarines, eliminate the enemies at the Orel Sea!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 SS(V) and 4 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 2-3.
notes:
Has the same quest name as Bm2.
Despite the quest description, other SS(V) like Maruyu and foreign SS(V) can be used.

title: 「航空水上打撃艦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy "Aviation Surface Strike Fleet"!
description: With a fleet using 2 aviation battleships and 2 aviation cruisers as basis, gain the sea control of Curry Ocean!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 BBV, 2 CAV, and 2 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 4-2.

title: 「第六戦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "6th Squadron"!
description: Deploy the "6th Squadron" and gain "complete victory" by eliminating enemies at the Orel Sea!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, and 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "8th Destroyer Division"!
description: Deploy a fleet containing the "8th Destroyer Division" and eliminate the enemies at the Orel Sea!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, Arashio, and 2 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 「第十八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "18th Destroyer Division"!
description: Deploy a fleet containing the "18th Destroyer Division" and eliminate the enemies at the Moray Sea!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, Shiranui, and 2 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 3-1.

title: 「第三十駆逐隊（第一次）」出撃せよ！Deploy The "30th Destroyer Division (1st Gen.)"!
description: With a fleet containing the "30th Destroyer Division (1st. Gen), battle the main fleet at the sea near Kis Island!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, Mochizuki, and 2 XX, then C+ rank the boss node of 3-2.

title: 「航空戦艦」抜錨せよ！"Aviation Battleship" Weigh Anchor!
description: With a fleet using 2 aviation battleships as basis, defeat the enemy forces at the Casgadama Island in the Western Sea Region!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 BBV and up to 4 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 4-4.

title: 「第三十駆逐隊」対潜哨戒！"30th Destroyer Division" Anti-Submarine Patrol!
description: Weigh anchor, "30th Destroyer Division (2nd Gen.)"! Carry out an anti-submarine patrol in front of the naval base!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Mutsuki, Uzuki, Yayoi, and Mochizuki, then C+ rank the boss node of 1-5.

title: 新編「第二航空戦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The Newly-Formed "2nd Carrier Division"!
description: With a fleet using the newly-formed "2nd Carrier Division" as basis, deploy to the sea near the Coral Islands and eliminate enemy mobile fleets!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Hiryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Souryuu, 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 5-2.

title: 精鋭「第二航空戦隊」抜錨せよ！Elite "2nd Carrier Division" Weigh Anchor!
description: With a fleet having the reformed "2nd Carrier Division" as basis, perform air raids at the enemy-held Ri Lanka Island and crush them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Souryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Hiryuu Kai Ni, 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 4-3.

title: 戦艦「榛名」出撃せよ！Deploy Battleship "Haruna"!
description: With a fleet having the twice-remodeled "Haruna Kai Ni" as basis, enter the "Southern Sea Region" and eliminate the enemy main forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Haruna Kai Ni and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss node of 5-1.

title: 「第六〇一航空隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "601st Air Group"!
description: Deploy a mobile fleet including the Unryuu-class aircraft carrier "Unryuu Kai" to the Coral Islands and eliminate the enemy mobile fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Unryuu Kai and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss node of 5-2.

title: 「軽空母」戦隊、出撃せよ！"Light Carrier" Squadron, Deploy!
description: With a fleet consisting of 1~2 light carriers, 1 light cruiser, and 3~4 destroyers, eliminate the enemy forces at the Cam Ranh Peninsula!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CVL, 1CVL/DD, 3 DD, and 1 CL, then S rank the boss node of 2-1.

title: 「水雷戦隊」バシー島沖緊急展開"Torpedo Squadron" Emergency Deployment To Sea Around Bashi Island
description: With a light cruiser-led torpedo squadron (maximum of 2 light cruisers, rest destroyers), eliminate the enemies at the sea around Bashi Island!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL as flagship, 1 CL/DD, and 4 DD, then S rank the boss node of 2-2.

title: 「第二戦隊」抜錨！"2nd Squadron" Weigh Anchor!
description: Send a fleet with "2nd Squadron" as basis to the Curry Ocean and eliminate enemy surface forces by repeated sorties!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou, Yamashiro, and 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 4-2 twice.

title: 「戦艦部隊」北方海域に突入せよ！"Battleship Squadron" Charge Into The Northern Sea Region!
description: Charge into the Northern AL Sea Region with a fleet including 2 battleships and 1 direct support light carrier (no regular carrier) and eliminate the enemies!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 (F)BB, 1 CVL, and 3 XX, then S rank the boss node of 3-5.
notes: XX cannot be a BBV or CV(B/L).

title: 「西村艦隊」南方海域へ進出せよ！Advance The "Nishimura Fleet" To The Southern Sea Region!
description: Advance the "Nishimura Fleet" to the Southern Sea Region, charge and eliminate the enemy main fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, Michishio, and 1 XX, then S rank the boss node of 5-1.

title: 「第六戦隊」南西海域へ出撃せよ！Deploy The "6th Squadron" To The Southwest Sea Region!
description: Using the "6th Squadron" with "Furutaka", "Kako", "Aoba", and "Kinugasa" as basis, eliminate the enemies at the sea around Okinoshima!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, and 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-5.

title: 「第十一駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "11th Destroyer Division"!
description: Deploy a fleet containing the "11th Destroyer Division" to the Orel Sea and eliminate the enemies!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, Murakumo, and 2XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 「第十一駆逐隊」対潜哨戒!"11th Destroyer Division" Anti-Submarine Patrol!
description: Send the "11th Destroyer Division" to the front of the naval base and carry out an anti-submarine patrol!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, and Murakumo, then C+ rank the boss node of 1-5.

title: 「第二一駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "21st Destroyer Division!
description: Deploy a fleet including the "21st Destroyer Division" to the Moray Sea in the Northern Sea Region and eliminate the enemies!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, Hatsushimo, and 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 3-1.

title: 「那智戦隊」抜錨せよ！Weigh Anchor, "Nachi Squadron"!
description: With a fleet consisting of flagship "Nachi", "Hatsushimo", "Kasumi", "Ushio", "Akebono", and 1 other ship, eliminate the enemies at the sea around Bashi Island!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nachi as flagship, Hatsushimo, Kasumi, Ushio, Akebono, and 1 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-2.

title: 「第二二駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "22nd Destroyer Division!
description: Deploy a fleet including the "22nd Destroyer Division" to the Nansei Islands Defense Line and eliminate the enemy main force fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 1-4.

title: 「改装防空重巡」出撃せよ！Deploy The "Remodeled Anti-Air Heavy Cruiser"!
description: Eliminate the enemy fleet at the Orel Sea with a fleet including "Maya Kai" or "Maya Kai Ni", a light cruiser, and two destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Maya Kai+, 1 CL, 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 新編「三川艦隊」ソロモン方面へ！Newly-Formed "Mikawa Fleet" To The Solomon Region!
description: Form the "Mikawa Fleet" as the first fleet, enter the Southern Sea Region, and eliminate the enemy fleets in the area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Choukai Kai Ni as Secretary, and any 5 of: "Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, Yuubari, or Tenryuu"; then S rank the boss node of 5-1.

title: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒なのです！"6th Destroyer Division" Anti-Submarine Patrol!
description: Send the "6th Destroyer Division" to the front of the naval base and carry out an anti-submarine patrol!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma, then C+ rank the boss node of 1-5.

title: 抜錨！「第十八戦隊」Weigh Anchor! "18th Squadron"
description: Deploy the "18th Squadron" with "Tenryuu" and "Tatsuta" as a basis and eliminate the enemy main force at the Orel Sea!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and at least 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 海上突入部隊、進発せよ！Maritime Assault Fleet, Advance!
description: With a fleet composed of Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma, proceed to enter the Southern Sea Region and eliminate the enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma, then S rank the boss node of 5-1.

title: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒を徹底なのです！"6th Destroyer Division" Thorough Anti-Submarine Patrol!
description: Perform anti-submarine patrol with a fleet including the "6th Destroyer Division" and strike at the enemy submarine fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Akatsuki Kai Ni, Hibiki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma, then A+ rank the boss node of 1-5.

title: 「第一水雷戦隊」ケ号作戦、突入せよ！Deploy The "First Torpedo Squadron" For The K-Go!
description: Deploy the First Torpedo Squadron to Northern Seas of Kis Islands! Defeat the enemy vessels, and return safely!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Abukuma as flagship, Hibiki, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare, and Shimakaze, then B+ rank the boss node of 3-2

title: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方ケ号作戦、再突入！"First Torpedo Squadron", Advance Again To The Northern K-Go Operation!
description: Redeploy the First Torpedo Squadron to Northern Seas of Kis Islands to eliminate the enemy vessels completely, and return safely!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Abukuma Kai Ni as flagship, Hibiki, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo, and Shimakaze, then S rank the boss node of 3-2

title: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化せよ！Strengthen The Anti-Submarine Patrol In Front Of The Naval Base!
description: Strengthen the anti-submarine patrol in front of the naval base and ensure the safeness of the transport routes by sea!
requirement: A+ rank the boss node of 1-5 4 times.

title: 「空母機動部隊」北方海域に進出せよ！"Mobile Carrier Fleet" Entering The Northern Sea Region!
description: Deploy a mobile carrier fleet led by an aircraft carrier to the Northern AL Region and eliminate enemy forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B) as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss node of 3-5.

title: 「第五航空戦隊」珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ！Sortie The "5th CarDiv" To The South!
description: Form the reorganized 5th Carrier division and proceed to the waters of the Coral Sea and eliminate the carrier task force!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 5-2.

title: 新編「第二一戦隊」北方へ出撃せよ！Sortie The "New 21st Cruiser Division"!
description: Deploy the improved 2nd Squadron and destroy the main enemy fleet in the Moral Sea in the Northern Waters!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nachi Kai Ni, Ashigara Kai Ni, Tama, Kiso and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 3-1.

title: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！Sortie The "16th Squadron (1st Gen.)"!
description: Deploy the 16th Cruiser Division (Primary) to the Bashi Islands and destroy the enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ashigara as flagship, Kuma, Nagara, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-2.

title: 「第三航空戦隊」南西諸島防衛線に出撃！Sortie The "3rd Carrier Division" To Protect The Nansei Islands!
description: Form the 3rd Carrier Division and deploy to the Southern Islands to intercept and destroy the enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Zuikaku Kai+ as flagship, Zuihou, Chitose Kou+, Chiyoda Kou+, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 1-4.

title: 「小沢艦隊」出撃せよ！Sortie The "Ozawa Fleet"!
description: Deploy the Ozawa Fleet to the Okinojima front to intercept and destroy the invading enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Zuikaku Kai+ as flagship, Zuihou Kai+, Chitose Kou+, Chiyoda Kou+, Ise Kai+, and Hyuuga Kai+, then S rank the boss node of 2-4.

title: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」出撃せよ！"16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)" Sortie!
description: Deploy the "16th Squadron (2nd Gen.)" to the Orel Sea, spot and destroy the enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Natori as flagship, Isuzu, and Kinu, then S rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 新編成航空戦隊、北方へ進出せよ！New Carrier Division, Advance To The North!
description: Advance towards The Alfonsinoes and eliminate the enemy mobile task force near their anchorage!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 CV(B), 2 BBV/CAV, and 2 DD, then S rank the boss node of 3-3.

title: 「礼号作戦」実施せよ！Carry Out "Operation Rei-go"
description: Powerful "Surface Counterattack Fleet", advance to the Nansei Islands along the coast from Okinojima! Destroy the Enemy Forces in the area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo, Kiyoshimo, and 1 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-5.

title: 旗艦「霞」北方海域を哨戒せよ！Flagship "Kasumi" Patrol The Northern Sea!
description: Deploy a fleet consisting of 4 Destroyers including Kasumi as flagship to the Moray Sea location and engage the enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kasumi Kai Ni/B as flagship, 3 DD, and 2 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 3-1.

title: 旗艦「霞」出撃！敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！Deploy Flagship "Kasumi"! Eliminate The Enemy Fleet!
description: Flag Kasumi Kai Ni, engage the enemy fleet off the coast of the Okinojima along the Nansei Islands and eliminate the enemy main forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kasumi Kai Ni/B as flagship, 2 DD, and 3 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 2-5.

title: 「第三十一戦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "31st Squadron (1st gen.)"!
description: Sortie the "31st Squadron (1st gen.) into the waters adjacent to the naval base and secure a safe passage along the route.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni, Uzuki Kai, and up to 3 XX, then reach node N on 1-6.

title: 「第二七駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "27th Destroyer Division"!
description: Deploy the 27th Destroyer Division with Shiratsuyu Kai as flagship to the Orel Sea and eliminate the enemy forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shiratsuyu Kai+ as flagship, Shigure, Harusame, Samidare, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 強襲上陸作戦用戦力を増強せよ！Strengthen Your Land-Base Assault Fleet!
description: While carrying out reconnaissance at Operation K, improve your fleet's capabilities for launching an amphibious warfare landing!
requirement: B+ rank the boss node of 6-3.

title: 製油所地帯を防衛せよ！Protect The Oil Refinery!
description: Deploy a torpedo squadron to the coastal oil refinery! Make sure to eliminate the enemy force lurking there 3 times!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL and 5 DD, then B+ rank the boss node of 1-3 3 times.

title: 南西諸島防衛線を強化せよ！Strengthen The Nansai Island Defense Line!
description: Deploy a powerful fleet along the Nansei Island Defense Line! Destroy the enemy fleet here 5 times!
requirement: S rank the boss node of 1-4 5 times.

title: オリョール海の制海権を確保せよ！Obtain Supremacy At the Orel Sea！
description: Use Ooshio as flagship and conduct repeated sorties in the Eastern Orel Seas! Eliminate the enemy forces within the area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ooshio as flagship, then S rank the boss node of 2-3 6 times.

title: 旗艦「大潮」出撃せよ！！Flagship "Ooshio", Sortie!!
description: Deploy Ooshio Kai Ni as a flagship along with a powerful fleet and patrol the Northern AL Waters while engaging in combat.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ooshio Kai Ni as flagship, then S rank the boss node of 3-5.

title: 艦隊、三周年！！Fleet, Third Anniversary!!
description: To commemorate the third anniversary, sortie to the coastal areas of the Bashi Islands and the Eastern Orel Sea, and eliminate the enemy forces within these areas!
requirement: S rank the boss nodes of 2-2 and 2-3.

title: 強行高速輸送部隊、出撃せよ！High-speed Transport Fleet, Sortie!
description: Take Sendai Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni, and Kawakaze Kai Ni, along with two other destroyers in the fleet and carry out the Jam Island Capture Operation!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Sendai Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni+, Kawakaze Kai Ni, 2 DD, and up to 1 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 4-1.

title: 「第一航空戦隊」西へ！"First Carrier Division", To The West!
description: Organize a Fleet with Akagi as flagship along with Kaga as the core part of your fleet and engage in the Abyssal Eastern Ocean Fleet Reduction Operation!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Akagi as flagship, Kaga, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss node of 4-5.

title: 新編艦隊、南西諸島防衛線へ急行せよ！Reformed Fleet, Set Sail To The Nansei Island Defense Line!
description: Take your newly reformed Torpedo Squadron to the Nansei Island Defense Line and eliminate the enemy forces within that direction!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1CL(T)/CT, 4 DD, and up to 1 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 1-4.

title: 鎮守府近海航路の安全確保を強化せよ！Strengthen The Safety Of The Local Naval Base Sea Route.
description: Set the newly reformed Torpedo Squadron, and patrol the Local Naval Base Sea Route. Strive to ensure the safety of the route!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL as flagship, 4 DD, and up to 1 XX, then reach node N on 1-6.

title: 「第三十一戦隊」敵潜を制圧せよ！"31st Squadron", Eliminate The Enemy Submarines!
description: Reform the 31st Squadron (1st Gen) head to the Naval Waters Adjacent to the Naval Base Route, perform repeated sorties till they eliminate the enemy submarine forces.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni, Uzuki Kai, and 3 XX, then reach node N on 1-6 twice.

title: 新編「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ!New Reformed "8th Destroyer Division", Sortie!
description: Take the Newly formed 8th Destroyer Division and sortie in the inshore route along the naval base waters! Strive to ensure and secure the route!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Asashio Kai Ni/D as flagship, Ooshio, Arashio, Michishio, and 2 XX, then reach node N on 1-6.

title: 精鋭！八駆第一小隊！Elite Force! 8th Destroyer Division First Platoon!
description: Take your newly formed 8th Destroyer Division First platoon and engage in an anti-submarine patrol near the naval base and launch a repeated assault to eliminate the hidden enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Asashio Kai Ni D as flagship, Ooshio Kai Ni, and 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 1-5 twice.
notes: Asashio Kai Ni cannot be used for this quest.

title: 水雷戦隊、南西防衛線に反復出撃せよ!Torpedo Squad, Repeatedly Engage The Nansei Island Defense Line!
description: Organize and form an escort fleet consisting of a light cruiser flagship and 4 destroyers and conduct repeated sorties at the Nansei Island Defense Line, ensure naval supremacy over the waters.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL(T)/CT as flagship, 4 DD, and 1 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 1-4 twice.

title: 製油所地帯沿岸の哨戒を実施せよ！Patrol The Oil Refinery Zone Coast!
description: Organize and form a fleet consisting of a light Carrier flagship and 3 destroyers to the Oil Refinery Zone Coast. Carry out a patrol of the area to ensure the safety of the ocean waters.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CVL as flagship, 3DD, and 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 1-3.

title: 水雷戦隊、南西諸島海域を哨戒せよ！Torpedo Squadron, Patrol The Southwestern Seas!
description: Form a powerful torpedo squadron fleet and set sail to the Southwestern Seas to patrol the Bashi Islands and the Eastern Orel Sea. Within the same waters, capture and eliminate the enemy main fleet patrolling these waters.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL(T)/CT as flagship, 4 DD, and 1 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2 and 2-3.

title: 「第十九駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Sortie The "19th Destroyer Division"!
description: Deploy the 4 Type Special destroyers of the 19th Destroyer Division to the seas near the Naval Base and conduct an anti-submarine patrol around the area, strive to suppress and dominate the enemy submarine forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ayanami, Shikinami, Uranami, and Isonami, then A+ rank the boss node of 1-5.

title: 「第十九駆逐隊」敵主力に突入せよ！"19th Destroyer Division", Engage The Enemy Flagship!
description: Organize a powerful fleet which includes the "19th Destroyer Division" to patrol off of Okinoshima in the Nansei Islands! Capture the enemy flagship while paroling within that route and eliminate it!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ayanami, Shikinami, Uranami, Isonami, and up to 2 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 2-5.

title: 飛行場設営の準備を実施せよ！Central Waters "Land Air Base" Deployment!
description: Conduct air reconnaissance in Operation K again and eliminate the enemy fleet along the route, then proceed to carry out preparations to construct a Land Air Base in the Central Waters!
requirement: S rank the boss node of 6-3.

title: 夜間突入！ 敵上陸部隊を叩け！Night Attack! Striking The Enemy Landing Force!
description: Rush out an elite force to the Battle Off Sav Island, break through the enemy ambush, then attack the enemy landing forces!
requirement: A+ rank the boss node of 5-3.

title: 夜の海を照らす「灯り」を入手せよ！Obtain The "Lantern" To Light The Night Sea!
description: Assemble a powerful fleet to the Cam Ranh Peninsula, while proceeding for replenishment, encounter the enemy fleet and eliminate them! Then you will obtain a "lantern" to illuminate the night sky. During a certain season, it can be useful outside of night battles!
requirement: S rank the boss node of 2-1.

title: 南西諸島防衛線を増強せよ！Reinforce The Nansei Island Defense Line!
description: Assemble a powerful fleet consisting of a seaplane tender or aviation cruiser as flagship and deploy them to the Nansei Island Defense Line, strength the same line of defense with the potential of your seaplanes. While in route, engage the enemy main fleet and eliminate them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 AV/CAV as flagship and 4 XX, then S rank the boss node of 1-4.

title: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」出撃せよ！Deploy The "16th Squadron (3rd Gen.)"!
description: Deploy the 16th Squadron (3rd Gen) to the Okinoshima Sea Front and Capture and defeat the enemy flagship fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami, Ooi, and up to 2 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 2-4.

title: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」突入せよ！Deploy The "Elite 16th Squadron"!
description: Assemble the newly formed "Elite 16th Division" and proceed to expand your operation to the Nansei Island Waters to patrol off Okinoshima, while in route, engage the enemy flagship fleet and eliminate them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kinu Kai Ni as flagship, and any 5 of: "Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Aoba Kai, Kuma Kai+, Shikinami Kai+, or Uranami Kai+"; then S rank the boss node of 2-5.

title: 輸送作戦を成功させ、帰還せよ！Report The Success Of A Transport Operation!
description: With Kinu Kai Ni as flagship, organize a fleet of 5 consort ships consisting of Uranami Kai and 3 other destroyers and conduct a "Weeping Willow Transport Operation" off Bashi Island, complete the same transport Operation and report back!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kinu Kai Ni as flagship, Uranami Kai+, 3 DD, and 1 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-2.

title: 重巡戦隊、抜錨せよ！Heavy Cruiser Squadron, Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a main fleet of four heavy cruisers with one as flagship and expand across the Eastern Orel Sea in the Nansei Islands area, at the same time, eliminate the main enemy fleet to gain control of the sea area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CA/CAV as flagship, 3 CA/CAV, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-3.

title: 戦艦戦隊、出撃せよ！Battleship Squadron, Sortie!
description: Deploy a battleship organized fleet consisting of 2 battleships with one as flagship to The Alfonsinoes in the Northern Waters, eliminate the enemy battleship within the Northern Waters to regain control of the area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 (F)BB(V) as flagship, 1 (F)BB(V), and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss node of 3-3.

title: 主力戦艦戦隊、抜錨せよ！Battleship Squadron, Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a powerful battleship squadron consisting of 2 battleships or aviation battleships and sail to the Okinoshima Islands, capture the invading enemy fleet and eliminate them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 BB(V) and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-4.

title: "精鋭「第八駆逐隊」突入せよ！Elite "8th Destroyer Division", Sortie!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of Arashio Kai Ni as flagship and one of her colleagues from "Destroyer Division 8" and sortie to the Northern Area of the Solomon Sea to confront and eliminate the main enemy fleet within the area to reduce the enemy's strength in the area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Arashio Kai Ni as Secretary, any 1 of: "Asashio, Ooshio, or Michishio"; and up to 4 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 5-5 twice.

title: 潜水艦隊、中部海域の哨戒を実施せよ！Submarine Fleet, Patrol The Central Waters!
description: Send your first fleet, which should be a powerful submarine fleet that consists of at least 4 strong submarines, one of them being the flagship, to the patrol line in the Central Waters, capture the enemy aircraft carrier that is navigating through the area, and attack it!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 SS(V) as Secretary, 3 SS(V), and up to 2 XX, then B+ rank the boss node of 6-1.

title: 重装甲巡洋艦、鉄底海峡に突入せよ！Heavy Armored Cruiser, Embark Into The Iron Bottom Sound!
description: Deploy "Zara Due" as flagship of the first fleet and send the said fleet to the Southern Sav Islands! Break through the enemy fleets in the area and crush the enemy forces that are deployed in Ironbottom Sound!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Zara Due as Secretary and up to 5 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 5-3.

title: 鎮守府海域警戒を厳とせよ！Defeat The Enemy Fleet At The Nansei Islands!
description: Organize a Fleet consisting of a light cruiser as flagship and deploy to the Nansei Island Defense Line, Bashi Islands, and Eastern Orel Sea and eliminate the main enemy fleet in the area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL as flagship and 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-2, and 2-3.

title: 洋上航空戦力を拡充せよ！Expand The Offshore Aviation Forces!
description: Organize a powerful fleet with a carrier or seaplane tender as flagship, deploy them to the Northern AL area, The Western Coast off from Casgadama, and off the Western Coast of the MS Islands, and eliminate the main enemy fleet in the areas.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L)/AV as flagship and 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-5, 4-4, and 6-2.

title: 改装航空巡洋艦、出撃！Remodeled Aviation Cruiser, Head Out!
description: Form a powerful fleet with the remodeled aviation cruiser "Suzuya Kai Ni" as flagship, deploy it to the Southern Sea, engage the enemy fleets that are patrolling the front part of the Southern Waters as well as Sav Island, and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Suzuya Kai Ni as flagship and up to 5 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 5-1 and 5-3.
notes: Suzuya Kou Kai Ni does not count as Suzuya Kai Ni for this quest.

title: 改装攻撃型軽空母、前線展開せよ！Deploy The Remodeled Light Attack Carrier To The Front!
description: Form a powerful fleet with the remodeled light attack carrier "Suzuya Kou Kai Ni" and send it to the Central Waters. Engage the enemy task forces at the MS Archipelago and the KW Atoll and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Suzuya Kou Kai Ni as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 6-2 and 6-5.
notes: Suzuya Kai Ni does not count as Suzuya Kou Kai Ni for this quest.

title: 鎮守府海域警戒を厳とせよ！Vigilantly Patrol The Sea Area Near The Naval Base!
description: Form a patrol fleet with a cruiser as flagship and at least two destroyers. Send the fleet on a patrol mission to the sea area near the naval base (Waters off of the Nansei Islands / Coastal Refinery Zone / Nansei Islands Defense Line / Seas Near The Naval Base)!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL/CA(V) as flagship, 2 DD, and up to 3 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 1-4, and 1-5.

title: 海上護衛体制の強化に努めよ！Reinforce The Coastal Guard!
description: Form an escort fleet with 3 or more DD or DE, then send them to the Coastal Refinery Zone, the Nansei Islands Defense Line, the Sea Near the Naval Base, and the Sea Route Near the Naval base and score victories at those maps.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 3 DD/DE and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-4, and 1-5, and reach the node N on 1-6.

title: 新編「第一戦隊」、抜錨せよ！New "First Squadron", Weigh Anchor!
description: Sortie with Nagato Kai Ni as flagship and Mutsu Kai! Send them to the Curry Ocean off Sri Lanka and the Northern Salmon Sea to destroy the main enemy fleets there!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nagato Kai Ni as flagship, Mutsu Kai+ as second ship, and 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 4-5 and 5-5.

title: 増強海上護衛総隊、抜錨せよ！To All Surface Escort Fleet reinforcements, Set Sail!
description: Sortie Quest: Organize a Fleet consisting of 1 light cruiser, 2 destroyers or escorts, an aviation cruiser, or a light aircraft carrier in your first fleet. Deploy them to each area of the Nansei Island Waters and destroy the enemy main fleet in each operation successfully!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CVL/CAV, 1 CL, 2 DD/DE, and 2 XX in the First Fleet, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 2-3, 2-4, and 2-5.

title: 新編「第七戦隊」、出撃せよ！New "Seventh Squadron", Sortie!
description: Sortie Quest: Sortie the New Seventh Squadron to the Curry Ocean area off Ri Lanka "Abyssal Eastern Ocean Fleet Reduction Operation" and the MS Island Operation "Defense of the MS Archipelago", engage the enemy main fleet and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kumano Kai Ni/Kou Kai Ni as flagship, Suzuya Kai Ni/Kou Kai Ni as second ship, Mogami Kai+, Mikuma Kai+, and 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 4-5 and 6-2.

title: 精鋭「第四航空戦隊」、抜錨せよ！Elite "Fourth Carrier Division", Weigh Anchor!
description: Elite "Fourth Carrier Division" Sortie Quest: Deploy the Elite Main Aviation Battleship Force known as the "Fourth Carrier Division" and Weigh Anchor! Proceed to conduct Combat Patrol off Okinoshima and the Northern AL Ocean Area, capture the main enemy forces and eliminate them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing both Lv50+ Ise and Hyuuga, with either as flagship and second ship, 1 CL, 2 DD, and 1 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 2-5 and 3-5.

title: 旗艦「由良」、抜錨！Flagship "Yura", Weigh Anchor!
description: Sortie Quest: Deploy your first fleet consisting of Yura Kai Ni as your flagship along with 2 of the following ships consisting of Yuudachi, Murasame, Harusame, Samidare, or Akizuki to the Eastern Orel Sea and the Forefront of the Southern Seas to engage the main enemy forces and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yura Kai Ni as Secretary, any 2 of: "Yuudachi, Murasame, Harusame, Samidare, or Akizuki"; and 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3 and 5-1.

title: 精鋭「第二二駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Elite "22nd Division", Sortie!
description: Sortie Quest: Sortie a powerful torpedo squadron that's including the reorganized elite DesDiv 22 to Kis Island in the northern sea, then have it complete the Kis Island evacuation mission flawlessly.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fumizuki Kai Ni, Satsuki Kai Ni, Nagatsuki Kai+, Minazuki Kai+, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 3-2.

title: 精強大型航空母艦、抜錨！Reinforced Large Aircraft Carrier, Weigh Anchor!
description: Deploy Saratoga Mk.II or Mod.2 as your flagship along with the "Task Force" to the Southern Waters North of the Salmon Sea and to the Central Waters at the waters off of the MS Archipelago, within these waters overpower the main enemy fleet and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Saratoga Mk.II/Mod.2 as Secretary, 1 CL, 2 DD, and 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-5 and 6-2.

title: 夜間作戦空母、前線に出撃せよ！Night Operation Carrier, Sortie To The Front Lines!
description: Deploy Saratoga Mk.II as your flagship to the offshore area of the KW Atoll, intercept the enemy Carrier Task force and succeed at "Intercepting the Main Enemy Carrier Unit"! Night Operation Carrier, Weigh anchor, and sortie to the Front Lines!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Saratoga Mk.II as Secretary, 5 XX, then S rank the boss node of 6-5.
notes: Saratoga Mk.II Mod.2 does not count as Saratoga Mk.II for this quest.

title: 補給線の安全を確保せよ！Safely Secure The Supply Line!
description: Organize a vigilant fleet consisting of a light cruiser flagship and at least 2 destroyers or escorts. With the same fleet vigilantly patrol the Naval Base Waters (Coastal Oil Refinery Area/Nansei Island Defense Line/ Waters Adjacent to the Naval Base) and safely secure the supply line!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL as flagship, 2 DD/DE, and up to 3 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-4, and 1-5.

title: 「第八駆逐隊」、南西へ！"8th Destroyer Division", To The South West!
description: 8th Destroyer Division Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of the "8th Destroyer Division" and deploy them Waters outside the Nansei Islands to the Naval District Waters and the Bashi Islands in the Nansei Island Waters. Capture the main enemy fleet in each of these waters and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Asashio, Arashio, Ooshio, Michishio and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2 and 2-2.

title: 最精鋭「第八駆逐隊」、全力出撃！Most Elite "8th Destroyer Division", All Out Sortie!
description: 8th Destroyer Division: Organize a fleet consisting of the Elite Members of the "8th Destroyer Division" as the main force of your fleet and deploy to the Kis Islands in the Northern Waters and then to the Salmon Waters in the Southern Waters. Completely eliminate the main enemy fleet in each of these locations with the power of the 8th Destroyer Division.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Asashio Kai Ni/D, Arashio Kai Ni, Ooshio Kai Ni, Michishio Kai Ni, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-2 and 5-4.

title: 北方海域戦闘哨戒を実施せよ！Provide combat patrols To The Arctic Waters!
description: Northern Sea combat patrol mission: Send an elite fleet with a light aircraft carrier, a seaplane tender as well as a light cruiser as its core force to the northern AL area. Have it provide several combat patrols in order to engage and destroy the main enemy reinforcement unit and secure the northern seafront!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CVL, 1CL, 1 AV, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss node of 3-5 twice.

title: 松輸送作戦、開始せよ！Commence The Matsu Transport Operation!
description: In order to strengthen the defense line, organize a fleet with Tatsuta Kai Ni or Tatsuta Kai as flagship along with 3 or more destroyers or escorts to form a transport fleet and conduct a sortie through the Nansei Island Defense Line, and the route nearby the naval base and complete them multiple times.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Tatsuta Kai+ as flagship, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 1-4 twice, and reach node N on 1-6 twice.

title: 精鋭「四水戦」、南方海域に展開せよ！Elite "4th Torpedo Squadron", Expand Into The Southern Waters!
description: Assemble 4 ships from the "4th Torpedo Squadron" (4Sd) with Murasame as flagship (and two other main ships in the fleet) and deploy into the Southern Waters. Proceed to go into the Southern Water Front Lines, Sav Island Sea Area, and the Salmon Sea area, and proceed to crush the enemy fleets in the same area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Murasame Kai Ni as flagship, any 3 of: "Yura Kai Ni, Yuudachi Kai Ni, Harusame Kai+, Samidare Kai+, or Akizuki Kai+"; and up to 2 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 5-1, 5-3, and 5-4.

title: 松輸送作戦、継続実施せよ！Continue The Matsu Transport Operation!
description: Organize an escort fleet led by a light cruiser or destroyer flagship, supported by at least three destroyer or escort ships, for the sake of further strengthening of the Nansei Islands Defensive Line as well as securing the sea routes adjacent to the Naval Base.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL(T)/CT/DD as flagship, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 1-4 3 times, and reach node N on 1-6 3 times.

title: 新編「四航戦」、全力出撃！Reformed "CarDiv 4", Sortie At Full Might!
description: Reform the Fourth Carrier Division comprised of aviation battleships Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai, as well as light cruiser Ooyodo Kai and at least one destroyer. Conduct combat patrols around the sea routes adjacent to the Naval Base, off Okinoshima Island (in the Okinoshima Sea), and in the Northern AL Waters. Engage in operations around the Curry Ocean Ri-Lanka Island.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ise Kai+, Hyuuga Kai+, Ooyodo Kai+, 1DD and up to 2 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 3-5, and 4-5, and reach node N on 1-6.

title: 精鋭駆逐隊、獅子奮迅！Elite Destroyer Division, Wreak Havoc!
description: Form a fleet which includes an elite destroyer division that consists of 4 destroyers with adequate equipment and experience. Send it to the sea route near the naval base, the Eastern Orel Bay, the Northern Kis Sea, and the Western Curry Sea, and have it complete its mission at each front!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 4 DD and up to 2 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 3-2, and 4-2, and reach node N on 1-6.

title: 「十八駆」、北方海域キス島へ!Destroy "DesDiv 18", Onward To The Northern Waters' Kis Island!
description: Deploy the elite "18th Destroyer Division" and carry out the Kis Island Evacuation Operation in the Northern Waters! Achieve repeated and decisive victories at the Kis Islands!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Arare Kai Ni, Kasumi Kai Ni/B, Kagerou Kai, Shiranui Kai, and up to 2 XX, and S rank the boss node of 3-2 twice.

title: 最精鋭甲型駆逐艦、圖入！敵中突破！！Elite Type-A Destroyers! Charging Through Enemy Territory!
description: Send a full fleet with either Kuroshio Kai Ni, Shiranui Kai Ni, or Kagerou Kai Ni as flagship and two other Lv75+ Type-A destroyers to the Western Curry Sea, the Northern Kis Island, The Southern Sav Island multiple times and have it complete each operation!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 1 of: "Kagerou Kai Ni, Shiranui Kai Ni, or Kuroshio Kai Ni" as flagship, any 2 Lv75+ from the: "Kagerou-class or Yuugumo-class", and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-2, 4-2, and 5-3, twice each.

title: 戦闘航空母艦、出撃せよ！Battle Carrier, Sortie!
description: Form a carrier-focused strike fleet with Ise Kai Ni, the lead ship of the remodeled aviation battleships (battle carriers), as flagship and core of the fleet, send it to the Northern AL Sea Combat Patrols, Ri Lanka in the Curry Sea as well as Peacock Island, and annihilate the enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ise Kai Ni as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-5, 4-5, and 6-4.

title: 「伊勢改二」、敵機動部隊を迎擊せよ！"Ise Kai Ni", Intercept the Enemy Task Force!
description: Deploy a fleet with the flagship Ise Kai Ni and two escort destroyers at its core to intercept the enemy carrier task force at the KW Atoll! Sortie there multiple times in order to intercept and completely annihilate the incoming enemy task force! Ise Kai Ni, set sail!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ise Kai Ni as flagship, 2 DD, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss node of 6-5 3 times.

title: 精鋭「第十八戦隊」、展開せよ！Expand the "Elite 18th Cruiser Division"!
description: Make a fleet consisting of the "18 Cruiser Division" along with 2 destroyers and complete the following operations at the Nansei Island Offshore Area, the Nansei Island Defense Line, the waters off the coast of the Naval Base, and the Waters along the seaside route near the naval base.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Tenryuu Kai Ni, Tatsuta Kai Ni, 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-4, 1-5, and reach node N on 1-6.

title: 精鋭「二七駆」第一小隊、出撃せよ！First Platoon Of The Elite "27th Destroyer Division", Sortie!
description: Organize the powerful fleet consisting of the first platoon of the 27th Destroyer division consisting of Shiratsuyu Kai Ni and Shigure Kai Ni then proceed to the Eastern Orel Sea, Jam Island Operation, Northern Salmon Sea Area, and Offshore the KW Atoll area and destroy the enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shiratsuyu Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni+, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 4-1, 5-5, and 6-5.

title: 精鋭「四戦隊」第二小隊、抜錨せよ！Elite "4th Cruiser Division" 2nd Platoon, Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize the powerful fleet consisting of the Second Platoon of the 4th Cruiser division consisting of Maya Kai Ni and Choukai Kai Ni then proceed to the Nansei Island Defense Line, Eastern Orel Sea, the Alfonsinoes, and the Curry Island Off Ri Lanka and destroy the enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Maya Kai Ni, Choukai Kai Ni, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-3, 3-3, and 4-5.

title: 精強「十七駆」、北へ、南へ！Powerful "DesDiv 17", To The North, To The South!
description: Sortie a fleet that includes the 4 ships of DesDiv 17, namely the remodeled Type-A destroyers, Isokaze B Kai, Hamakaze B Kai, Urakaze D Kai, & Tanikaze D Kai, to the sea area near the naval base, Kis Island, the Brunei Anchorage, the forefront of the southern sea, and engage and destroy the enemy forces there!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isokaze B Kai+, Hamakaze B Kai+, Urakaze D Kai+, Tanikaze D Kai+, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-5, 3-2, 7-1, and 5-1.

title: 「第七駆逐隊」、南西諸島を駆ける！"DesDiv 7", Advance To The Nansei Islands!
description: Form a powerful fleet that includes at least 2 ships of DesDiv 7, which consists of Oboro, Ushio, Akebono & Sazanami, annihilate the enemy forces at the Nansei Islands Coastal Waters, the Bashi Island Strait, the Eastern Orel Bay, the Okinoshima Sea, and secure our control of the Nansei Islands area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 2 of: "Oboro, Ushio, Akebono, or Sazanami"; and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-1, 2-2, 2-3, and 2-4.

title: 近海の警戒監視と哨戒活動を強化せよ！Reinforce Surveillance And Patrols Of The Coastal Sea!
description: Form a fleet that includes a CL as flagship and either 2 DD or 2 DE, then have it patrol the sea around the Nansei Islands, the Coastal Refinery Zone, the Nansei Islands Defense Line, the Nansei Islands Coastal Waters, and the Bashi Island Strait, and engage and destroy any enemy fleets in order to establish control of the coastal waters!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL as flagship, 2 DD/DE, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 1-4, 2-1, and 2-2.

title: 主力オブ主力、抜錨開始！Main Force Of The Main Force, Set Sail!
description: Type-A Destroyer Formation Mission: Deploy a powerful fleet that includes the elite DesDiv 10 consisting of the two Yuugumo-class destroyers Yuugumo Kai Ni & Makigumo Kai Ni to the southern sea, then have it engage and destroy the enemies at Sav Island, the Salmon Sea area and the northern Salmon Sea area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Makigumo Kai Ni, Yuugumo Kai Ni, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-3, 5-4, and 5-5.

title: 冬季北方海域作戦Winter Northern Waters Operation
description: Organize a Fleet with a light cruiser as flagship and sorting into the Moray Sea, The Alfonsinoes, The Northern Water Front Lines, and the Operation AL Sea Area multiple times. Successfully eliminate the enemy forces in the areas and take control of the Northern Waters!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-1, 3-3, 3-4, and 3-5 twice each.

title: 「比叡」の出撃"Hiei's" Sortie
description: Southern Sea Hiei Sortie Mission: Sortie a powerful fleet with fast battleship "Hiei" as flagship to Sav Island in the southern sea as well as the Salmon Sea area. Engage the enemy forces in those areas and annihilate them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Hiei as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-3 and 5-4.
notes: Resource rewards are based on IJN records of Hiei's sinking date.

title: 精鋭無比「第一艦隊」まかり通る！Unrivaled "First Squadron" Coming Through!
description: Organize your first fleet with the elite battleships, Nagato Kai Ni and Mutsu Kai Ni as part of your fleet and proceed to the Bashi Islands, the AL Operation Area, the Curry Ocean off from Ri Lanka, and the Southern Water Frontlines! Capture and destroy the main enemy fleets in the area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nagato Kai Ni and Mutsu Kai Ni with either as Secretary and second ship, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 3-5, 4-5, and 5-1.

title: 精鋭無比「第一艦隊」まかり通る！【拡張作戦】Unrivaled "First Squadron" Coming Through! [Extra Operation]
description: Organize your first fleet with the elite battleships, Nagato Kai Ni and Mutsu Kai Ni as part of your fleet and proceed to the Nansei Island Waters to patrol off of Okinoshima, the Southern Waters in the Eastern Salmon Sea, and the Central Waters at Peacock Island Capture Operation! Capture and destroy the main enemy fleets in the area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Nagato Kai Ni and Mutsu Kai Ni with either as Secretary and second ship, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 5-5, and 6-4.

title: 航空戦艦戦隊、戦闘哨戒！Aviation Battleship Squadron, Commence Combat Patrol!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of 2 aviation battleships as the main part of the fleet. Then sortie them to the Nansei Island Defense Line, the Waters Adjacent to the Naval Base Waters, Eastern Orel Sea, and Off the Coast of Tawi-Tawi. Engage the main enemy fleet and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 BBV and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 1-5, 2-3, and 7-2 (Part 2).

title: 最精鋭「第四航空戦隊」、出撃せよ！Super Elite 4th Carrier Division, Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of Ise Kai Ni and Hyuuga Kai Ni to form the Super Elite 4th Carrier Division in the first fleet.
