Then sortie them to the waters adjacent to the Naval Base and complete the operation multiple times, and go to the Ri Lanaka off from the Curry Ocean, the Eastern Salmon Sea, and the KW Atoll and eliminate the enemy fleet in the area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ise Kai Ni, Hyuuga Kai Ni, and up to 4 XX in the First Fleet, then S rank the boss nodes of 4-5, 5-5, and 6-5 once each, and reach node N on 1-6 twice.

title: 重改装高速戦艦「金剛改二丙」、南方突入！Heavily Remodeled Fast Battleship "Kongou Kai Ni C", Head To The South!
description: Southern Sea Sortie Mission: Repeatedly send a fleet with Kongō Kai Ni C as flagship with another Kongō-class ship as well as at least two destroyers as escorts to the Forefront of the Southern Sea, Sav Island, the Salmon Sea Area, the Northern Salmon Sea Area, and annihilate any enemies in these areas!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kongou Kai Ni C, 1 Kongou-class, 2DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-1, 5-3, 5-4, and 5-5 twice each.
notes: Resource rewards refer to the date of Kongou's sinking.

title: 艦隊司令部の強化 【実施段階】Fleet Headquarters Improvements [Implementation Phase]
description: Fleet Headquarters Improvements: Form a fleet that includes Ooyodo as flagship and either Akashi or a seaplane tender, then repeatedly send it to the Eastern Orel Bay, the Alfonsinoes, and the Western Jam Island Sea in order to engage and destroy the enemy fleets!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ooyodo as flagship, 1 AV/Akashi, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 3-3, and 4-1 twice each.

title: 近海哨戒を実施せよ！Patrol the Coastal Waters!
description: Patrol Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of 1 light cruiser along with 3 or more destroyers in your fleet, then proceed to sortie into the Naval District Waters to the Nansei Island Area, The Coastal Refinery area, the Nansei Island Coastal Area and the Bashi Islands in the Nansei Island Waters. Proceed to encounter and destroy the enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 2-1, and 2-2.

title: 精鋭「二四駆逐隊」出撃せよ！Peerless "DesDiv 24", Sortie!
description: "DesDiv 24" Mission: Form a fleet that includes Umikaze Kai Ni as flagship along with two members consisting of Kawakaze, Yamakaze, and/or Suzukaze, then send them to the Eastern Orel Bay, Okinoshima Island, The Forefront of Southern Sea, and the Sav Islands. Take control of the waters and destroy the enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Umikaze Kai Ni as flagship, any 2 of: "Kawakaze, Yamakaze, or Suzukaze"; and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 2-4, 5-1, and 5-3.

title: 精強！「第一航空戦隊」出撃せよ！Superior "CarDiv 1"! Sortie!
description: First Carrier Division Mission: Organize a Fleet consisting of Akagi Kai Ni/E as flagship and Kaga as the 2nd ship to form the center of the 1st Carrier Division. Then Deploy the fleet to the Curry Ocean off Ri Lanka, the Water off of the Coral Sea, and in addition, conduct repeated strikes in the water off of the KW Atoll. First Carrier Division, destroy the enemy Fleets!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Akagi Kai Ni/E as flagship, Kaga as second ship, and 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 4-5 and 5-2 once, and S rank the boss node of 6-5 twice.

title: 「羽黒」「神風」、出撃せよ！"Haguro" and "Kamikaze", Sortie!
description: Patrol Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of Haguro and Kamikaze as the main force along with either 1 heavy cruiser and 2 destroyers or 4 destroyers in your fleet, then proceed to sortie into the Nansei Island Coastal Area, the Bashi Islands, and the Eastern Orel Sea Area. Proceed to engage and destroy the enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Haguro, Kamikaze, and either "4 DD" or "1 CA(V) and 2DD (5 ships)", then S rank the boss nodes of 2-1, 2-2, and 2-3.
notes: Resource rewards are a reference to the date of Haguro's sinking.

title: 陸戦用装備の艦載運用実戦研究Research Of Shipborne Land-Based Equipment In Actual Combat
description: Research of Shipborne Land Based Equipment in Actual Combat: Organize a fleet that includes 1 Seaplane Tender or Landing Ship in your fleet to fight the enemy forces and defeat them multiple times in Waters off of Curry, Waters towards Ri Lanka and the Central Northern Offshore Sea of Peacock Island!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 AV/LHA and up to 5 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 4-5 and 6-4 twice each.

title: 「夕張改二」試してみてもいいかしら？I Wonder If We Should Test Out "Yuubari Kai Ni"?
description: Deploy a fleet with the remodeled experimental light cruiser Yuubari as flagship and deploy to the Nansei Island waters in the coast off Okinoshima, the Northern Waters of the Alfonsinoes, the Southern Waters off Sav Islands, and the Central Waters of the Guano Atoll! Seek out and destroy the main enemy fleets within the area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yuubari Kai Ni/Toku/D as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 3-3, 5-3, and 6-3.

title: 新編「六水戦」出撃！後で感想、聞かせてね！New "6th Torpedo Squadron" Sortie! Let Me Know What You Think Afterward!
description: Organize a Fleet consisting of 4 or more 6th torpedo Squadron members consisting of Yuubari Kai Ni as flagship and proceed into the Shore outside of the Naval District Waters, the Sea Routes outside the Naval Base Waters, Bashi Islands in the Nansei Island Waters, Kis Islands in the Northern Waters, and the sea around Brunei Strait in the South Western Waters. Proceed to complete the operation in each area once!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yuubari Kai Ni/Toku/D as flagship, any 3 of: "Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, Uzuki, Kikuzuki, or Mochizuki"; and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-5, 1-6, 2-2, 3-2, and 7-1.

title: 再編「第三一駆逐隊」、抜錨せよ！Reorganized "DesDiv 31", Weigh Anchor!
description: Sortie a fleet containing the reorganized 31st Destroyer Division consisting of Yuugumo-class destroyers Naganami, Kishinami, Asashimo, and Okinami Kai Ni. Deploy to Coastal Refinery Zone, Nansei Islands Defense Line, Seas Near the Naval Base, Bashi Strait, Eastern Orel Bay and destroy the enemy!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Naganami, Kishinami, Asashimo, Okinami Kai Ni, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-4, 1-5, 2-2, and 2-3.

title: 「第五航空戦隊」、縦横無尽！"5th Carrier Division", Go Wild!
description: Organize the 5th Carrier Division mobile task force fleet consisting mainly of the carriers Shoukaku and Zuikaku, along with the escort Destroyer Oboro and Akigumo. With said fleet, sortie into the Northern AL Area, Off the Coral Sea, Off the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage area, and the Off the KW Atoll. Locate the main enemy fleet and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-5, 5-2, 7-2 (Part 2), and 6-5.

title: 「比叡改二丙」見参！第三戦隊、南方突入！"Hiei Kai Ni C" Arrives! 3rd Battleship Squadron, To The South!
description: Organize fleet consisting of 2 Kongou-class fast battleships including Hiei Kai Ni C, along with 1 light cruiser, and 1 or more destroyers. With said fleet, sortie into the Northern Waters Front Lines, Coral Sea Area, Sav Islands, Salmon Sea Area, and the waters north of it. Locate the main enemy fleet and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Hiei Kai Ni C, 1 Kongou-class, 1 CL, 1 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-1, 5-2, 5-3, 5-4, and 5-5.

title: 改装航空軽巡「Gotland andra」、出撃！Remodeled Aviation Light Cruiser "Gotland Andra", Sortie!
description: Have Gotland Andra as your flagship, along with 1 or more destroyers in your fleet. With said fleet, proceed into Okinoshima in the Nansei Islands. Furthermore, proceed into the Western Waters of the Curry Ocean, Casgadama, and the waters off of the Curry Ocean near Ri-Lanka. Locate the main enemy fleet and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Gotland Andra as flagship, 1 DD, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-4, 4-2, 4-4, and 4-5.

title: 「Gotland」戦隊、進撃せよ！"Gotland" Squadron, Advance!
description: Have Gotland Andra as your flagship, along with 1 or more destroyers in your fleet. With said fleet, proceed into the water off of Okinoshima in the Nansei Islands, Furthermore, proceed into the Central Waters off the coast of Guano, the central area around Peacock Island, and the KW Atoll. Locate the main enemy fleet and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Gotland Andra as flagship, 1 DD, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 6-3, 6-4, and 6-5.

title: 南西諸島海域合同哨戒Nansei Island Water Combined Patrol
description: Organize a fleet consisting of 2 US ships as part of the main part of the fleet. Perform a patrol in the Nansei Island Waters area as Bashi Island, Eastern Orel Sea, and the Okinoshima Islands. Within each of the operation areas, search for the main enemy fleet and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 "USN ships" and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 2-3, and 2-4.

title: 合同艦隊旗艦、改装「Fletcher」、抜錨！Combined Fleet "Flagship", Remodeled Fletcher, Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet with Fletcher Kai Mod 2 as your flagship, along with 2 ships from the USA/UK/Australia/Netherlands as part of the fleet. Then proceed into the Nansei Island Defense Line, the Waters off Okinoshima Islands, and the North AL Operation area. Confront the main enemy fleet in the area and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fletcher Kai Mod.2 as flagship, any 2 USN/RN/RAN/RNN ships, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-5, and 3-5.
notes: Fletcher Mk.II does not count as Fletcher Kai Mod.2 for this quest.

title: 改装護衛駆逐艦「Fletcher Mk.II」作戦開始！Remodeled Escort Destroyer "Fletcher Mk.II" Commence Operation!
description: Organize a fleet with Fletcher Mk.II as your flagship, along with 2 ships from the USA/UK/Australia/Netherlands as part of the fleet. Then proceed into the Waters adjacent to the Naval District, Brunei Anchorage, MS Islands, and the KW Atoll. Confront the main enemy fleet in the area and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fletcher Mk.II as flagship, any 2 USN/RN/RAN/RNN ships, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-5, 7-1, 6-2, and 6-5 twice each.
notes: Fletcher Kai Mod.2 does not count as Fletcher Mk.II for this quest.

title: 同艦隊作戦任務【拡張作戦】Combined Fleet Operation Mission [Extra Operation]
description: Organize a fleet with Fletcher Mk.II, along with 3 ships from the USA/UK/Australia/Netherlands as part of the fleet. Then proceed into the Curry Ocean near the coast of Ri-Lanka, The Northern Salmon Sea Area, and the Central Water off of Peacock Islands. Destroy the main enemy fleets!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fletcher Mk.II, any 3 USN/RN/RAN/RNN ships, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 4-5, 5-5, and 6-4 twice each.
notes: Fletcher Kai Mod.2 does not count as Fletcher Mk.II for this quest.

title: 合同艦隊機動部隊、出撃せよ！Combined Fleet Mobile Task Force, Sortie!
description: Organize a fleet with 1 American or British-born carrier among the fleet. Then proceed into the Western Water of Ri-Lanka, the whole Northern Water battle, the Southern Waters Coral Sea Area, and the South Western Waters of Tawi-Tawi Anchorage in the deepest area. Confront the main enemy fleet in the area and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L) from the USN/RN, and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-4, 4-3, 5-2, and 7-2 (Part 2).

title: 【航空母艦特別任務】航空戦隊、精鋭無比！[Special Aircraft Carrier Mission] Our Carrier Divisions, Peerless And Unmatched!
description: Special Aircraft Carrier Mission: Organize a carrier task force with an efficient air squadron that has two or more strong regular aircraft carriers as the core part of the fleet. Sortie to the Nansei Islands Offshore Okinoshima area, Off the Coast of Okinoshima Island, and on the Western Waters Coast of Ri Lanka Island! Destroy enemy forces with all you got!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 CV(B) and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-4, 2-5, and 4-3.

title: 改加賀型航空母艦「加賀改二」、抜錨！Remodeled Kaga-class Aircraft Carrier "Kaga Kai Ni", Set Sail!
description: Organize a fleet with Kaga Kai Ni as your flagship, along with 1 or more carriers making up part of the fleet. Then proceed into the Western Waters off the coast of Casgadama, Off the coast of Ri Lanka within the Curry Ocean area, the whole Northern Waters Battle, and the Southern Waters in the Coral Sea area. Destroy the enemy forces with all you got!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kaga Kai Ni/E/Go as flagship, 1 CV(B), and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-4, 4-4, 4-5, and 5-2.

title: 最精鋭「第一航空戦隊」、出撃！鎧袖一触！Peerless "CarDiv 1", Sortie! Defeat Them With A Single Strike!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of Kaga Kai Ni and Akagi Kai Ni as the core part of your fleet to form the peerless "First Carrier Division" with their elite air squadron. Then deploy into the Northern Salmon Sea Area, The Deepest Part of Tawi Tawi Anchorage, the MS Islands, and the KW Atoll. Confront the main enemy fleet in the area and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kaga Kai Ni/E/Go, Akagi Kai Ni/E, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-5, 7-2 (Part 2), 6-2, and 6-5.

title: 重巡「羽黒」、出撃！ペナン沖海戦Heavy Cruiser "Haguro", Sortie! Battle Of The Malacca Strait
description: With a fleet of 5 or less ships, organize Haguro as flagship and sortie into the Malacca Strait in the South Western Waters! Destroy the enemy destroyer fleets in the Penang Island Sea multiple times. Strong heavy cruiser Haguro, sortie!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Haguro as flagship, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss node of 7-3 (Part 1) 4 times.

title: 静かな海を護る「鯨」、動き出す！And Thus The "Whale" Stirs To Protect The Calm Sea!
description: Form a fleet using Taigei or Jingei as flagship and have 2 submarines as part of the fleet. Then with your fleet, patrol the Offshore Nansei Islands, the Oil Refinery Area, Nansei Islands Coastal Waters, and the Eastern Orel Sea area. Take control of the seas within each of these locations!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Taigei/Jingei as flagship, 2 SS(V), and 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 2-1, and 2-3.

title: 主力オブ主力、縦横無尽ッ！Main Force Of The Main Force, Go Wild!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of the powerful 10th Destroyer Division as part of your fleet and then proceed to deploy into the Nansei Island Defense Line, Bashi Island, Kis Island, Jam Island, and deep in the area offshore of Penang Island of the Malacca Strait.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yuugumo Kai Ni, Makigumo Kai Ni, Kazagumo Kai Ni, Akigumo Kai Ni, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-2, 3-2, 4-1, and 7-3 (Part 2).

title: 精鋭「二七駆」、回避運動は気をつけて！Elite "DesDiv 27", Be Careful During Evasive Maneuvers!
description: Special mission of the 27th Destroyer Division: Organize a fleet consisting of the remodeled destroyers of the 27th Destroyer Division, Shiratsuyu Kai Ni and Shigure Kai Ni, as part of your fleet. And then proceed to sortie into the Seas Near the Naval District, Off the waters of Okinoshima Island, Offshore of Brunei Anchorage, North of the Salmon Sea Area, and along the Guano Atoll area. Destroy the main enemy fleet.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shiratsuyu Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni+, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-5, 2-5, 7-1, 5-5, and 6-3.

title: 【艦隊司令部強化】艦隊旗艦、出撃せよ！[Fleet Headquarters Reinforcement] Fleet Flagship, Sortie!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of either Ooyodo or Tan Yang as flagship and at least 3 or more destroyers or coastal defense ships within the fleet. Then sortie into the Oil Refinery Area, Nansei Island Defense Line, the seas near the Nansei Islands, and Bashi Island multiple times. Defend the seas!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ooyodo/Tan Yang as flagship, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-4, 2-1, and 2-2 twice each.
notes: Yukikaze Kai Ni does not count as Dan Yang for this quest.

title: 奇跡の駆逐艦「雪風」、再び出撃す！Miraculous Destroyer "Yukikaze", Sorties Once Again!
description: Organize a powerful fleet consisting of either Tan Yang or Yukikaze Kai Ni as flagship and deploy into the Eastern Orel Sea, Okinoshima Waters, Off the Coast of Okinoshima Waters, The Alfonsinoes area, and the deepest parts of the Penang Island in the strait of Malacca multiple times. Capture and destroy the main enemy fleet in the areas.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Tan Yang/Yukikaze Kai Ni as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 2-4, 2-5, 3-3, and 7-3 (Part 2).

title: 最精強！「呉の雪風」「佐世保の時雨」Unmatched! "Yukikaze Of Kure" & "Shigure Of Sasebo"
description: Organize a fleet with Yukikaze Kai Ni and Shigure Kai Ni as the core part of the fleet. Then deploy into the water along the Sav Islands, North of the Salmon Sea Area, the Curry Ocean near Ri Lanka Island, the Central Water along Peacock Island, and the KW Atoll.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shigure Kai Ni+, Yukikaze Kai Ni, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 4-5, 5-3, 5-5, 6-4, and 6-5.

title: 北の海から愛をこめてFrom The Northern Seas With Love
description: Organize a fleet, then sortie into the Moray Sea, the Kis Island, the Alfonsinoes, the entire Northern Water area, and the Northern Operation AL area. With your fleet, take control of the North Sea area!
requirement: A+ rank the boss nodes of 3-1, 3-2, 3-3, 3-4, and 3-5.

title: 球磨型軽巡一番艦、出撃だクマ!Kuma-class Light Cruiser Name Ship, Beary Eager To Sortie!
description: Organize a fleet with Kuma Kai Ni/D in your fleet as flagship and sortie into the Naval district Sea route, Bashi Island Sea in the Nansei Island Sea, Kis Islands in the Northern Sea, the deepest parts of the Malacca Strait outside of Penang Island in the Southwestern Sea. Complete all operations and destroy the main enemy fleets within each area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kuma Kai Ni/D as flagship and up to 5XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 3-2, 7-3 (Part 2), and reach node N on 1-6.

title: 改装最新鋭軽巡「能代改二」、出撃せよ！Remodeled State Of The Art Light Cruiser Noshiro Kai Ni, Sortie!
description: Organize a fleet with Noshiro Kai Ni along with 3 destroyers under her command and sortie into the Okinoshima Area, Kis Island, Sav Islands, Brunei Anchorage, and deep within the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage. Capture and destroy the main enemy fleet.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Noshiro Kai Ni, 3 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-4, 3-2, 5-3, 7-1, and 7-2 (Part 2).

title: 精鋭「第七駆逐隊」、出撃せよ！Elite DesDiv 7, Sortie!
description: Organize a fleet consist the DesDiv 7 Members Akebono Kai Ni and Ushio Kai Ni then sortie into Nansei Island East Orel Sea, Northern Sea's Kis Islands, Western Sea's Casgadama, and the Southern Sea's Salmon Sea Area. Confront the main enemy fleets and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Akebono Kai Ni, Ushio Kai Ni, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 3-2, 4-4, and 5-4.

title: 改装航空巡洋艦「最上」、抜錨せよ！Remodeled Aviation Cruiser "Mogami", Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet with Mogami Kai Ni or Mogami Kai Ni Toku as flagship. Sortie to the Bashi Island Strait, the Okinoshima Island, the Curry Ocean Ri-Lanka Island, and the Forefront of the Southern Sea areas, and destroy the enemy forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Mogami Kai Ni/Toku as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 2-4, 4-5, and 5-1.

title: 西村艦隊、精鋭先行掃討隊、前進せよ！Elite Vanguard Squadron, Nishimura Fleet, Forward!
description: Organize a fleet with Mogami Kai Ni or Mogami Kai Ni Toku as flagship, plus any two Nishimura Fleet DDs. Sortie to the Eastern Orel Bay, Peacock Island, the deep parts of Tawi-Tawi Anchorage, and the deep parts of Penang Island. Crush the enemy fleets!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Mogami Kai Ni/Toku as flagship, any 2 of: "Michishio, Shigure, Asagumo, or Yamagumo"; and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 6-4, 7-2 (Part 2), and 7-3 (part 2).

title: 二水戦旗艦、この「矢矧」が預かります！Yahagi, Assuming Command Of "DesRon 2"!
description: Organize a fleet with Yahagi Kai Ni or Yahagi Kai Ni B as flagship, plus 2 DD and 3 XX. Sortie to the Nansei Islands, the Okinoshima Sea, the Sav Island, and the Northern Solomon Sea Area. Destroy all abyssal forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yahagi Kai Ni/B as flagship, 2 DD, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-5, 5-3, and 5-5.

title: 新しき翼。改装航空母艦「龍鳳」、出撃せよ！New Wings, Remodeled Light Carrier "Ryuuhou", Sortie!
description: Have Ryuuhou Kai Ni/E as flagship along with Shigure Kai Ni in the first fleet. Sortie to the Nansei Islands area's Bashi Channel, the Eastern Orel Bay, the Okinoshima Islands, the Okinoshima Sea, and the deepest parts of the sea near the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage in the Southwestern Area. Engage and destroy any enemy fleets!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ryuuhou Kai Ni/E as Secretary, Shigure Kai Ni+, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 2-3, 2-4, 2-5, and 7-2 (Part 2).

title: 改装特務空母「Gambier Bay Mk.II」抜錨！Remodeled Utility Carrier "Gambier Bay Mk.II" Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of Gambier Bay Mk.II as flagship along with at least 1 Fletcher-class destroyer as part of the fleet. With your fleet, sortie into the Waters off Okinoshima, The AL Operation Area, and the Waters Off from Peacock Island and successfully destroy the enemy multiple times in the same areas!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Gambier Bay Mk.II as Secretary, 1 Fletcher-class, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-4, 3-5 twice each, and A+ rank the boss node of 6-4 twice.

title: 【作戦準備】第二段階任務(対地/対空整備)[Operation Preparation] Second Stage Mission (Surface/Anti-Air Maintenance)
description: Organize a fleet consisting of 3 destroyers within the fleet and proceed into the Coastal Refinery Area, Nansei Island Defense Line, Nansei Island Patrol Area, and the Nansei Island Bashi Channel. Within these areas, confront the main enemy fleet and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 3 DD and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-4, 2-1, and 2-2.

title: 「山風改二」、抜錨せよ！"Yamakaze Kai Ni", Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet with Yamakaze Kai Ni/D as flagship along with 3 destroyers in the fleet. Then proceed into the Nansei Islands, the Coastal Refinery, The Nansei Island Defense Line, and the Waters Adjacent to the Naval District, and successfully secure defensive control in the naval district waters.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yamakaze Kai Ni/D as flagship, 3 DD, up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 1-4, and 1-5.

title: 白露型駆逐艦「山風改二」、奮戦す！Shiratsuyu-class Destroyer "Yamakaze Kai Ni", Will Fight Hard!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of any 2 among Yamakaze Kai Ni/D, Umikaze Kai Ni, and Kawakaze Kai Ni, as part of the core. Then proceed towards the Bashi Channel, Tawi Tawi Anchorage, Souther Water Front lines, and the Waters near Peacock Island, and within each area, destroy the main enemy fleet in each area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 2 of: "Yamakaze Kai Ni/D, Umikaze Kai Ni, or Kawakaze Kai Ni"; and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 7-2 (Part 2), 5-1, and 6-4.

title: 奮戦！精鋭「第十五駆逐隊」第一小隊Fight Hard! Elite "DesDiv 15" 1st Platoon
description: Organize a fleet consisting of Oyashio Kai Ni and Kuroshio Kai Ni within it and deploy them into the Nansei Island Area in the Okashima Islands, Salmon Sea Area in the Southern Waters, the deepest parts of the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage Area. Confront and destroy the main enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Oyashio Kai Ni, Kuroshio Kai Ni, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-4, 5-4, and 7-2 (Part 2), twice each.

title: 南西海域「基地航空隊」開設！Southwestern Waters "Land Base Air Squadron" Established!
description: Destroy enemy fleets near the Nansei Islands Patrol Area, Bashi Strait, the Eastern Orel Sea, and Deep off the coasts of Penang Island in the South Western Waters! Reach the port at Taiwan on the Shonan mainland route. Prepare a "Construction Corps" x1 and deploy the "Land Base Air Squadron" in the southwestern sea area that covers the area!
requirement:
S rank the boss nodes of 2-1, 2-2, 2-3, and 7-3 (Part 2), and reach node O in 7-4.
Prepare 1 Construction Corps.

title: 海上護衛! ヒ船団を護り抜け!Maritime Escort! Protect The Convoy!
description: Hi Convoy Maritime Escort Mission: Southwest Sea Area: Complete operations on the Shonan Mainland Route and protect the Hi Convoy heading from Shonan to the mainland from the threat! Fleet, Land Base Air Squadron, sortie!
requirement: Clear 7-4 HP bar (up to 5 Boss kills).

title: 航空母艦「雲鷹] 、抜錨せよ!Escort Carrier "Unyou", Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet with Unyou as flagship (Also known as Yawata Maru) and destroy the enemy forces in the Shonan mainland route, deep in the Tawi-Tawi anchorage, Off the coast of Okinoshima, and Off the Coasts of Peacock Island in the central northern sea area! Escort Carrier "Unyou", Sortie!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Unyou as flagship and up to 5 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 7-2 (Part 2), 7-4, and 6-4.

title: 改特型駆逐艦「天霧改二」、出撃す！Remodeled Type Special Destroyer "Amagiri Kai Ni", Sortie!
description: Organize a Fleet consisting of Amagiri Kai Ni along with 2 other ships consisting of Aoba, Ooi, or Sagiri as part of the fleet, then proceed into the Bashi Channel, the deepest parts of the coast of Penang, Norther Sea Front Line, Salmon Sea Area, and Off the coast of peacock island, with the full force of your fleet, destroy the main enemy forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Amagiri Kai Ni/D, any 2 of: "Aoba, Ooi, or Sagiri"; and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 7-3 (part 2), 5-1, 5-4, and 6-4.

title: 第十六戦隊、改装「浦波改二」出撃します！DesDiv 16, Remodeled "Uranami Kai Ni" Sortie!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of Uranami Kai Ni along with Kinu and Aoba as part of the fleet, then sortie into the Nansei Island Defense Line, the Eastern Orel Sea, The seas off the shore of Okashima, Tawi Tawi, and the Shounan Sea Route! Destroyer all main enemy fleets within each location!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Uranami Kai Ni, Kinu, Aoba, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-3, 2-5, 7-2 (part 2), and 7-4.

title: 「磯波改二」、抜錨せよ！"Isonami Kai Ni", Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a powerful fleet consisting of the remodeled Type Special destroyer Isonami Kai Ni as part of the fleet and then proceed into the outside the Nansei Island Sea area, the Oil Refinery Area, and the South Western Waters Front Lines! Confront the main enemy fleets in each area and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isonami Kai Ni, and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, and 5-1.

title: 改大和型戦艦「大和改二」、出撃せよ！Remodeled Yamato-class Battleship "Yamato Kai Ni", Sortie!
description: Form a fleet with Yamato Kai Ni/Juu as the flagship along with 1 light cruiser and 2 destroyers as part of the fleet then commence a sortie into the Naval District Waters Nansei Island Defense Line, the Nansei Island Waters Off the coast of Okinoshima, The Western Waters off the coast of Kasugadama, and the Western Waters along the western water frontlines! Locate and destroy the main enemy fleets!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yamato Kai Ni/Juu as flagship, 1 CL, 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-5, 4-4, and 5-1.

title: 見敵必殺！最精鋭大和型「第一戦隊」抜錨！Kill On Sight! The Best Elite Yamato-class "1st Battle Squadron" Weigh Anchor!
description: From a fleet with the two main class remodeled battleships, Yamato Kai Ni/Juu and Musashi Kai Ni along with 2 destroyers as part of your fleet. Proceed into the Curry Ocean area near Ri Lanka, the coasts of the Sav Islands, the deepest parts of Tawi-Tawi Anchorage, and the KW Atoll, and proceed to destroy the main enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yamato Kai Ni/Juu, Musashi Kai Ni, 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 4-5, 5-3, 7-2 (Part 2), and 6-5.

title: 【拡張作戦】重改装「大和改二重」、出撃！[Extra Operation] Heavily Remodeled "Yamato Kai Ni Juu", Sortie!
description: [Extra Operation] Form a powerful fleet consisting of Yamato Kai Ni Juu as the flagship and then proceed to the coast off Panyeng Island, the Shounan Sea Route, the waters east of the Solomon Sea, and off the coast of peacock island. Destroy the enemy fleet in each location!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yamato Kai Ni Juu as flagship, and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 7-3 (part 2), 7-4, 5-5, and 6-4.
notes: Yamato Kai Ni does not count as Yamato Kai Ni Juu for this quest.

title: 抜錨！精強「第十五駆逐隊」Weigh Anchor! Strong "15th Destroyer Division"
description: Organize a fleet consisting of two or more members of "Destroyer Division 15" which must include Hayashio Kai Ni, Oyashio Kai Ni, or Kuroshio Kai Ni as part of the fleet, then proceed into the Okashima Waters, the Southern Waters of the Salmon Sea area, the waters north of the Salmon Sea area, and the Central Waters area off Peacock Island, proceed to destroy the main enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 2 of: "Hayashio Kai Ni, Oyashio Kai Ni, or Kuroshio Kai Ni"; and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-4, 5-4, 5-5, and 6-4.

title: 米駆逐艦部隊の奮戦The Hard Fight Of US Destroyer Unit
description: Organize a fleet of 2 ships from the Fletcher class or John C. Butler class ship as part of the fleet and conduct repeated sorties into the Eastern Orel Sea in the Nansei Islands, Off the Coast of Peacock Island in the Central Waters, Off the coast of Panang Island in the South Western Waters and Shonan Sea Route, proceed to destroy the main enemy fleet.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 2 from the: "Fletcher-class or John C. Butler-class"; and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 7-3 (part 2), 7-4, and 6-4, twice each.

title: Samuel B.Roberts Mk.II、抜錨せよ！Samuel B.Roberts Mk.II, Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet using the remodeled destroyer Samuel B. Robbers Mk.II as your flagship of the fleet, then sortie into the seas near the Naval District, the Naval District Sea route, Bashi Island within the Nansei Islands, and Operation AL in the Northern Waters and destroy the main enemy fleets! Thanks a lot!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Samuel B. Roberts Mk.II as flagship and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-5, 2-2, and 3-5, and reach node N on 1-6.

title: 不屈敢闘「Taffy Ⅲ」、Weigh anchor!Unyielding Fight "Taffy Ⅲ", Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet that includes Gambier Bay, Johnston, and Samuel B. Roberts as part of the Taffy III force, then sortie into the Easter Orel Sea in the Nansei Islands, Off the waters of Okashima Island, Off the Coast of Ri-Lanka near the Curry Ocean in the Western Waters, and North of the Salmon Sea area in the Southern Waters. Destroy the main enemy fleets!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Gambier Bay, Johnston, Samuel B. Roberts, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-3, 2-5, 4-5, and 5-5.

title: 機動部隊旗艦「鳳翔改二」、前線に出撃せよ！Mobile Task Force Flagship "Houshou Kai Ni", Sortie To The Front!
description: Organize a fleet with Houshou Kai Ni/Sen as flagship then deploy them to the Nansei Island Off Okashima, The Northern AL Operation Area, The Curry ocean off Ri Lanka, The Southern Waters off the Coral Sea, the sea off Peacock Island, and the Shounan Sea Route. Confront the main enemy fleet and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Houshou Kai Ni/Sen as flagship, and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 3-5, 7-4, 4-5, 5-2, and 6-4.

title: 改装特I型駆逐艦「深雪改二」、出撃せよ！Remodelled Type Special I Destroyer "Miyuki Kai Ni", Sortie!
description: Organize an elite fleet consisting of the remodeled Type Special destroyer "Miyuki Kai Ni" along with 1 Fubuki-class destroyer, then sortie into the Northern Waters of the Kis Islands, the Southwestern Waters of the coast off Panang, the Southern Waters of the Save Islands, and the Central Waters off Peacock Island. Confront and destroy all main fleets in the deepest parts!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Miyuki Kai Ni, 1 Fubuki-class, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-2, 7-3 (Part 2), 5-3, and 6-4.

title: 改金剛型高速戦艦「榛名改二乙/丙」、抜錨！Improved Kongou-class Fast Battleship "Haruna Kai Ni B/C", Sortie!
description: Organize an elite fleet consisting of Haruna Kai Ni B/C, Kongou Kai Ni C, along with 2 destroyers, then sortie into the Bashi Strait, Okashima Island Waters, Off the Coast of the Java Sea, Ri Lanka, Sav Islands, and the Salmon Sea Area. Confront the main enemy fleet in the areas and destroy them! Weigh Anchor!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Haruna Kai Ni B/C, Kongou Kai Ni C, 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 2-4, 7-5 (Part 3), 4-3, 5-3, and 5-4.

title: 【海上護衛作戦】海上補給線を確保せよ！[Marine Escort Operation] Secure The Maritime Supply Line!
description: 海上護衛任務：海防艦3隻または駆逐艦4隻または水上機母艦2隻を含む艦隊で、製油所地帯沿岸、鎮守府近海、鎮守府近海航路、南西諸島バシー海峡に反復出撃！重要な海上補給線を確保せよ！
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 3 DE, OR 4 DD, OR 2 AV, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-5, 2-2 twice each, and reach node N on 1-6 twice.

title: 改装白露型精鋭駆逐艦「時雨改三」出撃す！The Most Elite! Improved Shigure Exercises, Commence!
description: 「時雨改三」及び第二七駆逐隊(白露・有明・夕暮)僚艦1隻を含む艦隊で、沖ノ島沖、昭南本土航路、カレー洋リランカ島沖、サーモン海域北方、中部北海域ピーコック島沖の敵戦力を撃滅せよッ！
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shigure Kai San, any 1 of: "Shiratsuyu, Ariake, or Yuugure"; and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 7-4, 4-5, 5-5, and 6-4.

title: 【期間限定任務】飛べ！世界の下駄履き機！[Time-Limited] Fly! Seaplanes Of The World!
description: Organize a fleet with a seaplane tender as flagship along with 2 or more destroyers or coastal defense ships as a part of the fleet and then proceed into the Nansei Island Defense Line, Eastern Orel Sea, and the waters off Okashima Island. Locate and Destroy the main enemy forces in each area!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 AV as flagship, 2 DD/DE, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-3, and 2-4.
notes: Limited Time QuestStill available despite being described as a Limited Time Quest

title: 敵艦隊を撃破せよ！Defeat An Enemy Fleet!
description: Deploy a fleet, spot the enemy fleet, and eliminate it!
requirement: Defeat an Abyssal fleet by obtaining a B+ rank.

title: 敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！Eliminate The Enemy Fleet Main Force!
description: Deploy a fleet and spot the enemy fleet's "main force"! Eliminate it!
requirement: Participate in a sortie battle.

title: 敵艦隊を10回邀撃せよ！Encounter Enemy Fleet 10 Times!
description: Deploy all fleets! Encounter the wandering enemy fleets 10 times!
requirement: Participate in 10 sortie battles.

title: 敵空母を3隻撃沈せよ！Sink 3 Enemy Carriers!
description: Enemy carriers threaten our fleet. Spot them, eliminate them, and sink 3 of them!
requirement: Sink 3 enemy CV or CVL.
notes: Available only on days of the month ending in -3, -7, or -0

title: 敵補給艦を3隻撃沈せよ！Sink 3 Enemy Resupply Ships!
description: Deploy a fleet, spot the enemy resupply ships, and eliminate them!
requirement: Sink 3 enemy Transport Ships (AP).

title: 敵輸送船団を叩け！Strike At The Enemy Transport Fleet!
description: Sink 5 or more enemy transport ships to cut off the enemy supply line!
requirement: Sink 5 enemy Transport Ships (AP).
notes: Available only on days of the month ending in -2 or -8

title: 南西諸島海域の制海権を握れ！Gain Control Of The Nansei Island Sea Region!
description: Deploy all fleets to the Nansei Island Sea Region, spot multiple enemy fleet main forces, and eliminate them!
requirement: Obtain 5 B+ ranks at boss nodes in World 2.

title: 敵潜水艦を制圧せよ！Suppress The Enemy Submarines!
description: Deploy a fleet with sufficient anti-submarine capability and hunt the enemy submarines!
requirement: Sink 6 enemy SS.

title: あ号作戦Operation A-Gou
description: Sortie for the week with all forces, spot as many enemy fleets as possible, and confront them!
requirement:
Fulfill all of the following:
Sortie 36 times,
Reach any boss nodes 24 times,
B+ rank any boss node 12 times,
S rank any node 6 times.
notes:
Doing a Sortie on a map counts as 1 Sortie, even if there are several battles.
Each category contributes 25% towards the quest progress, so the 50% / 80% display is not a good benchmark for this quest.

title: い号作戦Operation I-Gou
description: Sortie for the week with a powerful carrier fleet and eliminate as many enemy carriers as possible!
requirement: Sink 20 CV or CVL.
notes: Even if the quest description states otherwise, carriers are not needed for this quest.

title: 海上通商破壊作戦Maritime Trading Disruption Operation
description: Sink 20 enemy transports within the week!
requirement: Sink 20 Transport Ships (AP).

title: ろ号作戦Operation Ro-Gou
description: Sortie with all forces for the week, spot & eliminate enemy transport fleets, and cut off enemy supply lines!
requirement: Sink 50 Transport Ships (AP).

title: 海上護衛戦Maritime Escort Operation
description: With a maritime escort fleet capable of strong anti-submarine warfare, eliminate as many enemy submarines as possible!
requirement: Sink 15 SS.

title: 敵東方艦隊を撃滅せよ！Eliminate Enemy Eastern Fleet!
description: Sortie to the Western Sea Region, spot the main forces of the enemy eastern fleet, and eliminate them!
requirement: B+ rank any boss nodes of World 4 12 times.

title: 敵北方艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！Eliminate Enemy Northern Fleet Main Forces!
description: Sortie to the depth of Northern Sea Region, spot the main forces of the enemy eastern fleet, and eliminate them!
requirement: B+ rank the boss node of either 3-3, 3-4, or/and 3-5, 5 times.

title: 敵東方中枢艦隊を撃破せよ！Destroy Enemy Eastern Core Fleet!
description: Sortie to the Casgadama Island in the Western Sea Region, spot the enemy eastern core fleet, and destroy it!
requirement: B+ rank the boss node of 4-4.

title: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖の制空権を握れ！Gain Air Superiority At The Coral Islands In The Southern Sea Region!
description: Sortie to the Coral Islands in the Southern Sea Region, eliminate enemy mobile fleet, and gain complete victory!
requirement: S rank the boss node of 5-2 twice.

title: 海上輸送路の安全確保に努めよ！Work On Securing Maritime Transport Routes!
description: Repeat anti-submarine patrol in front of the naval base and secure safe maritime transport routes!
requirement: A+ ranks the boss node of 1-5 3 times.

title: 「第五戦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "5th Squadron"!
description: Perform combat patrol off Okinoshima with the "5th Squadron", gain sight of the enemy main fleet and eliminate it!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Haguro, Myoukou, Nachi, and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss node of 2-5.

title: 「潜水艦隊」出撃せよ！Deploy The "Submarine Fleet"!
description: Repeat sorties into the Central Sea Region Patrol Line with a fleet mainly consisting of submarines and reduce the enemy forces!
requirement: S rank the boss node of 6-1 3 times.

title: 「水雷戦隊」南西へ！"Torpedo Squadron" To Nansei!
description: Deploy a light cruiser-led torpedo squadron (maximum of 3 light cruisers and rest destroyers), and eliminate enemies at the Nansei Islands Defense Line!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 to 3 CL with 1 as flagship, at 1 to 5 DD, and no other ships type, then S rank the boss node of 1-4.
notes: Evacuating ships will prevent the completion of the quest, even if the requirements are met both at the start and the end of the sortie.

title: 「水上打撃部隊」南方へ！"Surface Strike Fleet" To The South!
description: Form a surface strike fleet with 3 battleships, 1 light cruiser, and others, sortie to the Southern Sea Region, and eliminate the enemy fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing exactly any 3 from the: "Yamato-class, Nagato-class, Ise-class, or Fusou-class"; 1 CL, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 5-1.

title: 海上護衛強化月間Month Of Enhanced Maritime Escort
description: Strengthen the anti-submarine patrol in the seas in front of the naval base, suppress the enemy submarines, and establish a safe maritime convoy!
requirement: A+ rank the boss node of 1-5 10 times.

title: 「空母機動部隊」西へ！"Mobile Carrier Fleet", To The West!
description: Form a mobile carrier fleet consisting of 2 carriers (and 2 destroyers) and eliminate the enemy fleet at the Curry Ocean!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 CV(B/L), 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss node of 4-2.

title: 「水上反撃部隊」突入せよ！"Surface Counterattack Fleet" Charge!
description: Charge into the sea off Okinoshima with a destroyer-led surface raid fleet consisting of 1 heavy cruiser, 1 light cruiser, and 4 destroyers!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 4 DD with 1 as flagship, 1 CL, and 1 CA, then S rank boss node of 2-5.
notes: CAV do not count as CA here.

title: 兵站線確保！海上警備を強化実施せよ！Secure The Supply Lines! Strengthen The Marine Guard!
description: Marine Guard Mission: Form a maritime escort fleet that consists of one light carrier or light cruiser type ship and a total of at least three destroyers and/or coastal defense ships, then have it guard the sea around the Nansei Islands, carry out a maritime escort mission, the First Southern Operation, patrol the Nansei Islands, and destroy any enemies in the areas!
requirement: Assemble a fleet consisting of 1 CVL/CL, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, 1-4, and 2-1.

title: 沖ノ島海域迎撃戦Encounter Battle At Okinoshima Island
description: Organize the Powerful Fleet and launch a repeated assault at the Okinoshima Sea Front, intercept the Enemy Task Force, and eliminate them!
requirement: S rank the boss node of 2-4 twice.

title: 戦果拡張任務！「Z作戦」前段作戦　他Ranking Points Boost Mission! "Operation Z", First Part
description: Ranking Points Boost Mission: Deploy the first fleet, consisting mainly of powerful ships, destroy the enemy fleets at Okinoshima Island in the Nansei Archipelago and the Guano Atoll Sea, then crush the enemy forces at Peacock Island in the northern area of the Central Waters!
requirement: Assemble the First Fleet, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 2-4, 6-1, 6-3, and S rank the boss node of 6-4.

title: 強行輸送艦隊、抜錨！Enforced Transport Fleet, Weigh Anchor!
description: Route Convoy Mission: Assemble a fleet consisting of 2 aviation battleships and/or resupply ships and conduct a convoy at the Sea Route Near Naval Base. Complete the map twice.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 BBV/AO and up to 4 XX, then reach node N on 1-6 twice.

title: 前線の航空偵察を実施せよ！Carry Out Air Reconnaissance In The Front Lines!
description: Reconnaissance Mission: Deploy a reconnaissance fleet consisting of 1 seaplane tender and 2 light cruisers as the main part of the fleet and deploy to the Guiano Atoll in the Central Waters! Perform repeated air reconnaissance of "Operation K"! Engage the enemy fleet on route and try to eliminate the main enemy Fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 AV, 2 CL, and up to 3 XX, then A+ rank the boss node of 6-3 twice.

title: 北方海域警備を実施せよ！Commence The Arctic Waters Defense!
description: Arctic Waters Defense Mission: Commence the Arctic Waters Defense. Deploy a Fleet consisting of at least 1 light cruiser to the Arctic Waters of the Moray Sea, Kiss Island, and the Alphonso. Make sure to secure control over the Arctic Waters Defenses.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1CL and up to 5 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 3-1, 3-2 and 3-3.

title: 精鋭「三一駆」、鉄底海域に突入せよ！Elite "31st Destroyer Division", Storm Into The Iron Bottom Sound Area!
description: Mandatory Tokyo Express Mission: Organize the 31st Destroyer Division to conduct a convoy operation in the Southern Salmon Sea Area. Conduct the Tokyo Express operation in the Iron Bottom Sound area while at the same time eliminating the main enemy forces several times.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Naganami Kai Ni, any 1 of "Takanami Kai+, Asashimo Kai+, or Okinami Kai+"; and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss node of 5-4 twice.

title: 新編成「三川艦隊」、鉄底海峡に突入せよ！New Mikawa Fleet, Rush Into The Iron Bottom Sound!
description: Iron Bottom Sound Wartime Expansion: Organize a rushing fleet force consisting of 4 ships from the units of Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, or Yuubari. Rush into the Southern Waters Front lines, The Sav Islands, and the Salmon Sea Area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 4 of: "Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, or Yuubari"; and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-1, 5-3, and 5-4.

title: 泊地周辺海域の安全確保を徹底せよ！Thoroughly Secure The Sea Around The Anchorages!
description: Coastal Anchorage Guard Expansion: Form a powerful anchorage patrol unit, then repeatedly sortie to the sea near the naval base, the Brunei Anchorage, and the Tawi-Tawi Anchorage! Suppress the enemy submarines roaming each area, then engage and destroy the enemy forces that are becoming a threat to the area around the anchorages!
requirement: S rank the boss nodes of 1-5, 7-1, 7-2 (Part 1), and 7-2 (Part 2), three times each.

title: 空母戦力の投入による兵站線戦闘哨戒Utilize The Supply Line Logistics Of Your Carrier Force!
description: Organize a Patrol fleet that includes a carrier, and patrol, the Oil Refinery Area, Nansei Island Defense Line, Nansei Island Front Waters, The waters of Bashi Strait, and the Eastern Orel Sea. Vigilantly patrol the area and engage the main enemy fleet in the area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L) and up to 5 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 1-4, 2-1, 2-2, and 2-3.

title: 戦果拡張任務！「Z作戦」後段作戦Military Gains Extra Operation! "Operation Z" Latter Part
description: Military Gains Extra Operation: Deploy an elite fleet from the first fleet into the Southern Western Coast off Tawi-Tawi, off the Southern coast of the Salmon Seas, off the MS Island Region, and of the KW Atoll and proceed to destroy the enemy.
requirement: Assemble the First Fleet, then S rank the boss nodes of 7-2 (Part 2), 5-5, 6-2, and 6-5.

title: 南西諸島方面「海上警備行動」発令"Surface Security Actions" Around The Nansei Archipelago Announcement
description: Maritime Defense Patrol Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of one light carrier or light cruiser, 3 destroyers or escorts. Deploy into the First Southern Operation, Nansei Island Patrol, Willow Transport, and Orel Patrol and destroy the main fleet within the areas.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CVL/CL, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-4, 2-1, 2-2, and 2-3.

title: 発令！「西方海域作戦」Announcement! "Western Waters Operation"
description: Large-Scale Sortie Operation: "Western Waters Operation" has been officially announced! Organize a strong fleet, conduct a full-scale sortie across the entire Western Waters Area, and destroy all of the main opposing enemy forces within the areas.
requirement: S rank the boss nodes of 4-1, 4-2, 4-3, 4-4, and 4-5.

title: 拡張「六水戦」、最前線へ！Expanded "6th Torpedo Squadron", To The Front Lines!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of Yuubari Kai Ni as flagship along with a fleet of 2 or more 6th Torpedo Squadron destroyers or Yura Kai Ni among the fleet. With said fleet, sortie into the Southern Water Front Lines, The Southern Salmon Sea Area, the Central Waters off the Northern Area of Peacock Island, and the KW Atoll area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yuubari Kai Ni/Toku/D as flagship, either Yura Kai Ni or any 2 of: "Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, Uzuki, Kikuzuki, or Mochizuki"; and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-1, 5-4, 6-4, and 6-5.

title: 精鋭「十九駆」、躍り出る！Elite "DesDiv 19", In the Spotlight!
description: Command an elite fleet including the remodeled Type Special II Ayanami Kai Ni and Shikinami Kai Ni to the frontlines, spot and destroy the enemy main forces at Combat Patrol Off Okinoshima of Nansei Island Waters, Throughout the Northern Sea in Northern Waters, Off the Curry Ocean toward Ri-Lanka in the Western Waters, and Sav Island in Southern Waters!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ayanami Kai Ni, Shikinami Kai Ni, and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-5, 3-4, 4-5, and 5-3.

title: 「海防艦」、海を護る！"Coastal Defense Ships", Protecting The Sea!
description: With a maritime escort fleet consisting of 5 or fewer ships of which 3 are destroyer escorts, secure and perform anti-submarine patrol at the waters of Sea in Front of the Naval Base, Sea around the Nansei Islands, Coastal Refinery Zone, Seas Near the Naval Base, and Sea Route Near Naval Base. Destroyer Escort Fleet, sortie!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 3 DE and up to 2 XX (5 ships max), then A+ rank the boss nodes of 1-1, 1-2, 1-3, and 1-5, and reach node N on 1-6.

title: 工作艦「明石」護衛任務Repair Ship Akashi Escort Operations
description: Organize an escort fleet consisting of the repair ship Akashi as flagship, along with at least 3 Destroyers as the escort. With said fleet, proceed into the Oil Refinery Area, the Naval District Sea Route, the Nansei Island Patrol area, Bashi Channel, and the Eastern Orel Sea. Successfully deliver a battle using Akashi's escorts in the same areas.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Akashi as flagship, 3 DD, and up to 2 XX , then A+ rank the boss nodes of 1-3, 2-1, 2-2, and 2-3, and reach node N on 1-6.

title: 重巡戦隊、西へ！Heavy Cruiser Squadron, To The West!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of at least 3 heavy cruisers (not including aviation cruisers) and at least 1 or more Destroyers and advance into the Western waters of Jam Island, The Curry Ocean, Ri-Lanka, and Casgadama. Confront the main enemy fleets in these locations and destroy them.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 3 CA, 1 DD, and up to 2XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 4-1, 4-2, 4-3, and 4-4.
notes: CAV do not count as CA here.

title: 歴戦「第十方面艦隊」、全力出撃!Experienced "10th Area Fleet", Go All Out!
description: Organize a powerful fleet consisting of two ships, from among the heavy cruisers Haguro, Ashigara, Myoukou, and Takao, and the destroyer Kamikaze, which will serve as the main part of the fleet. Then do repeated sorties into the deepest part of the Penang Island Sea in the Malacca Strait, the deepest part of Tawi-Tawi Anchorage, and Western Waters Curry Ocean Operation! Destroy the enemy in these locations!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 2 of: "Haguro, Ashigara, Myoukou, Takao, or Kamikaze"; and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 7-2 (Part 2), 7-3 (part 2), and 4-2 twice each.

title: 鎮守府近海海域の哨戒を実施せよ！Carry Out A patrol In The Waters Near The Naval District!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of a heavy cruiser or destroyer as flagship along with 3 additional destroyers or coastal defense Ships as part of the fleet, then proceed into the Seas outside the Nansei Island, the Coastal Refinery Zone, and the Nansei Island Defense Line. Take control of the seas within each area.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CA/DD as flagship, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 1-2, 1-3, and 1-4 twice each.

title: 南西方面の兵站航路の安全を図れ！Secure The Logistics Route To The Nansei Islands!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of a light cruiser, training cruiser or destroyer as flagship along with 3 additional destroyers or coastal defense Ships as part of the fleet, then proceed into the Waters Adjacent to the Naval District, the Naval District Sea Route, and the Nansei Island Coastal Patrol. Defeat the enemy fleets within the area multiple times.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL/CT/DD as flagship, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then A+ rank the boss nodes of 1-5 and 2-1 twice each, and reach node N on 1-6 twice.

title: 空母機動部隊、出撃！敵艦隊を迎撃せよ！Aircraft Carrier Task Force, Sortie! Intercept The Enemy Fleet!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of an aircraft carrier as flagship along with 2 additional heavy cruisers or aviation cruisers that make up part of the fleet, then proceed into the Bashi Strait, Eastern Orel Sea, and the Okinoshima Islands. Confront the main enemy in the area and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L) as flagship, 2 CA(V), and up to 3 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 2-3, and 2-4.

title: AL作戦Operation AL
description: Organize a fleet consisting of 2 light aircraft carriers as part of your fleet, then proceed into the Moray Sea Area, The Alfonsinoes, the entire Northern Sea Area, and the Northern Operation AL Area. Perform Operation AL in the Northern Waters. Confront the main enemy in the area, and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 CVL and up to 4 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 3-1, 3-3, 3-4, and 3-5.

title: 機動部隊決戦Naval Task Force Decisive Battle
description: Organize a fleet with an aircraft carrier as part of your first fleet, then proceed into the Coral Sea Area, Eastern Salmon Sea, the KW Atoll, and the waters around Peacock Island. Confront the main enemy in the area and destroy them several times!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L) as Secretary and up to 5 XX in the First Fleet, then S rank the boss nodes of 5-2, 5-5, and 6-5 twice each, and A+ rank the boss node of 6-4 twice.

title: 日英米合同水上艦隊、抜錨せよ！Japan-UK-USA Joint Surface Fleet, Weigh Anchor!
description: Organize a fleet without carrier consisting of 3 or more US and British remodeled ships then proceed to the Northern Waters of Moray Sea, the Alfonsinoes, the Western Waters of Ri-Lanka, and the Southwestern Waters off the coast of the Penang Sea, then confront the main enemy forces!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing at least 3 USN/RN ships, and up to 3 XX, then A rank the boss nodes of 3-1, 3-3, 4-3, 7-3 (part 2).
notes:
CV(B/L) are not allowed, not even from USN or RN.
Despite the quest name, it is possible to assemble a fleet containing only USN or RN ships, or containing ships from other countries, as long as the requirements are met.

title: 精鋭「第十九駆逐隊」、全力出撃！The Elite "Nineteenth Destroyer", Sortie With All Their Might!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of the Elite 19th Destroyer Division destroyers, Isonami Kai Ni, Uranami Kai Ni, Ayanami Kai Ni, and Shikinami Kai Ni as part of the fleet, then proceed to the Waters Adjacent to the Naval District, Nansei Island area Eastern Orel Sea, Northern Sea Area Kis Island and the Southern Sea area of the Sav Islands. Locate the main fleet on each map and destroy them!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isonami Kai Ni, Uranami Kai Ni, Ayanami Kai Ni, Shikinami Kai Ni, and up to 2 XX, then S rank the boss nodes of 1-5, 2-3, 3-2, and 5-3.

title: はじめての「演習」！Your First "Exercise"!
description: Perform "Exercises" with a fleet of another admiral (player)!
requirement: Participate in 1 PVP battle.

title: 艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！Increase The Experience Of The Fleet!
description: Increase the experience of the fleet prior to the operation! Win 3 or more times today during "Exercise"!
requirement: Score 3 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.
notes:
Progress shared with Cd2 where applicable, but one win while this quest is activated is needed to complete it.
3 or more victories prior to flagging this quest will display 80% progress.

title: 演習を強化、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！Strengthen The Fleet Via Experience From Exercises!
description: Gain even more experiences for the fleet! Win 4 or more times today during "Exercise"!
requirement: Score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.
notes:
Progress shared with Cd1 and Cd2 where applicable, but one win while this quest is activated is needed to complete it.
4 or more victories prior to flagging this quest will display 80% progress.

title: 北方再突入に備え、練度向上に努めよ！Train For The Upcoming Mission To Return To The Northern Sea!
description: Train for the upcoming Northern Sea mission! Win 4 or more times today during "Exercise"!
requirement: Score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.
notes:
Progress shared with Cd1 and Cd2 where applicable, but one win while this quest is activated is needed to complete it.
4 or more victories prior to flagging this quest will display 80% progress.

title: 上陸部隊演習！Wargames For The Landing Squad!
description: In order to increase the expertise level of the Island landing squad, you need to win 4 naval practice sessions today!
requirement: Score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 輸送部隊の練度向上に務めよ！Work On Improving The Experience Of Your Transport Unit!
description: Exercise Quest: Work on improving the experience of your Transport Unit! Win 4 Battles during Exercise in a day!
requirement: Score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 甲型駆逐艦の戦力整備計画Project To Improve The Combat Strength Of the Type-A Destroyers
description: Type-A Destroyer Maintenance Mission: Score 3 Victories in Exercises using 2 Type-A destroyers (Kagerou/Yuugumo-class Destroyers), then proceed to sortie the fleet out to the Nansei Island. Use the combat capabilities of your fleet to strengthen and maintain the performance of your Destroyers.
requirement:
Assemble a fleet containing any 2 from the: "Kagerou-class or Yuugumo-class"; and up to 4 XX, then:
Score 3 S ranks in PVP within the same day, then,
A+ rank the boss nodes of 2-2, 2-3, 2-4, and 2-5.

title: 精鋭「第二一駆」、猛特訓！Elite "DesDiv 21", Commence Special Drill Exercises!
description: Destroyer Division Training Mission: Form a fleet comprised of three members of the elite 21st Destroyer Division. Initiate extra hard before-operation training and secure four training victories with this fleet within one day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Wakaba Kai+, Hatsuharu Kai Ni, Hatsushimo Kai Ni and up to 3 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 駆逐隊、特訓始め！Destroyer Division, Commence Exercises!
description: Destroyer Exercise Mission: Organize a Destroyer Squadron consisting of 4 Destroyers. This destroyer squadron can be used in a fleet composition. Commence the exercise and win 4 exercises on the same day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 4 DD and up to 2 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 海防艦、演習始め！Coastal Defense Ships, Commence Exercises!
description: Escort Ship Exercise Mission: Form a training fleet containing a coastal defense ship as flagship and at least 2 destroyers as escorts. Score at least 2 victories within the same day using this training fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 DE as flagship, 2 DD, and up to 3 XX, then score 2 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 最精鋭甲型駆逐艦、特訓始め！Elite Type-A Destroyers, Commence Special Training!
description: Type-A Destroyer Exercise Mission: Form a destroyer fleet consisting of four Lv.70+ Type-A destroyers (Kagerō/Yūgumo-class). Form a fleet based around this elite unit. Commence exercises! Score at least four victories within the same day using this fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 4 Lv70+ from the: "Kagerou-class or Yuugumo-class"; and up to 2 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 戦闘航空母艦一番艦、演習始め！Lead Ship Of The Battle Carriers, Commence Exercises!
description: Remodelled Aviation Battleship (Battle Carrier) Mission: Form an aviation squadron consisting of Ise Kai Ni as flagship and at least 2 destroyers as escorts. Score at least three victories within the same day using this aviation squadron and show your mastery over this newly remodeled ship!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Ise Kai Ni as flagship, 2 DD, and up to 3 XX, then score 3 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 改夕雲型、演習始め！Remodelled Yuugumo-class, Begin Training!
description: Remodelled Yuugumo-class Training Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of the 2 Yuugumo-class destroyers Yuugumo Kai Ni and Naganami Kai Ni. Take your remodeled Yuugumo-class destroyers to training! Complete a successful day by earning 4 wins in a single day in Practice!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yuugumo Kai Ni, Naganami Kai Ni, and up to 4 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 朝潮型集合！特訓始め！Asashio-class Assemble! Special Training Begins!
description: Asashio-class Exercise Mission: Organize a fleet that includes 4 destroyers from the Asashio-class. Win 4 exercises in a single day with that fleet! Asashio-class sally forth!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 4 from the Asashio-class and up to 2 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 精強「十七駆」、猛特訓！Powerful "DesDiv 17", It Is Time For Some Hardcore Training!
description: Destroyer Fleet Exercise Mission: Form a fleet that includes the 4 ships of the powerful DesDiv 17. We're starting an extra hard training course for the newly remodeled and powerful destroyer fleet! Obtain at least 4 victories in exercises within the same day with said fleet!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isokaze B Kai+, Hamakaze B Kai+, Urakaze D Kai+, Tanikaze D Kai+, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 艦載機演習Aircraft Carrier Exercise
description: Carrier Exercise Mission: Form a carrier task force that contains at least 2 standard aircraft carriers, one of them as the flagship, as well as 2 destroyers. Improve the skills of your carriers! Have the fleet achieve at least 3 victories in exercises within the same day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B) as flagship, 1 CV(B), 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then score 3 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 六周年記念演習6th Anniversary Exercise
description: 6th Anniversary Exercise Mission: Form a fleet that consists of 6 ships and includes at least one light cruiser type as well as at least three destroyers and/or coastal defense ships. Have this fleet score at least 4 S-Ranks in exercises within the same day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 航空戦隊演習(その壱)Aviation Squadron Training (Part 1)
description: Aviation Training Mission: Organize a fleet, which consists of 3+ carriers and 2+ destroyers. Improve your fleet's combat skills and capabilities through naval exercises! Achieve 3 victories (S rank) on the same day.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 3 CV(B/L), 2 DD, and up to 1 XX, then score 3 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 航空戦隊演習(その弐)Aviation Squadron Training (Part 2)
description: Aviation Training Mission: Organize a fleet, which consists of 3+ carriers and 2+ destroyers. Improve your fleet's combat skills and capabilities through large-scale naval exercises! Achieve 6 victories (S rank) on the same day.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 3 CV(B/L), 2 DD, and up to 1 XX, then score 6 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 新しき盾New Type Shield
description: Organize the "New Shield" fleet consisting of heavy cruisers Maya and Haguro in the fleet. In the "New Shield" exercise, score 3 victories (S ranks) on the same day during the exercise.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Maya, Haguro, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.
notes: Resource rewards refer to the ship numbers of JMSDF's Maya and Haguro.

title: 輸送船団演習Transport Fleet Exercise
description: Transport Fleet Exercise: Form a fleet consisting of at least 2 supply ships, landing ships, or coastal defense ships. Conduct an exercise with this fleet and score 4 victories (A rank) or more today.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 2 AO/LHA/DE and up to 4 XX, then score 4 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 睦月型集合！演習始め！Mutsuki-class Assemble! Commence Training!
description: Mutsuki-class Fleet Exercise: Form a Mutsuki-class exercise fleet consisting of 4 members of the Mutsuki-class destroyers. On the same day, conduct an exercise with this fleet and score 4 victories or more today. The Mutsuki-class will do our best nashi~!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 4 from the "Mutsuki-class" and up to 2 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 航空母艦演習Aircraft Carrier Exercises
description: Aircraft Carrier Exercise Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of a standard carrier as flagship along with 1 or more additional standard carriers and 2 or more additional destroyers in the fleet. Improve your aircraft carriers' training by scoring 4 wins in exercise.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B) as flagship, 1 CV(B), 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「第十方面艦隊」演習！"10th Area Fleet" Exercises!
description: 10th Area Fleet Exercise Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of 2 ships which include the heavy cruisers Ashigara and Haguro or the destroyer Kamikaze as the main part of the fleet. Obtain 4 (A Ranks) victories or higher within the same day.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 2 of: "Haguro, Ashigara, or Kamikaze"; and up to 4 XX, then score 4 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 奇跡の駆逐艦The Miraculous Destroyer
description: Form a powerful exercise fleet that consists of at least 4 destroyers, including Yukikaze as the flagship, then score at least 4 S-Rank victories within the same day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yukikaze as flagship, 3 DD, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 改装航空巡洋艦「最上」、進発せよ！Remodeled Aviation Cruiser "Mogami", Go Wild!
description: Organize a fleet with Mogami Kai Ni or Mogami Kai Ni Toku as flagship, plus 3 DDs. With your fleet, score 4 PVP victories (A ranks) within the same day.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Mogami Kai Ni/Toku as flagship, 3 DD, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 改装「矢矧」、精鋭水雷戦隊旗艦演習！Exercises With The Elite Remodeled DesRon Flagship, "Yahagi"!
description: Organize a fleet with Yahagi Kai Ni or Yahagi Kai Ni B as flagship, plus 4 DDs. With your fleet, score 4 PVP victories (A ranks) within the same day.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yahagi Kai Ni/B as flagship, 4 DD, and up to 1 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「Taffy Ⅲ」 This is a drill!"Taffy Ⅲ" This Is A Drill!
description: Organize the Taffy III fleet consisting of the ships, Samuel B. Roberts, Johnston, and Gambier Bay as part of your fleet and score 4 S ranks in Practice on the same day! This is a drill. I repeat, this is a drill.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Samuel B. Roberts, Johnston, Gambier Bay, and up to 3 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 第一線航空母艦「鳳翔改二」、演習開始！Frontline Aircraft Carrier [Houshou Kai Ni], Begin Exercises!
description: Organized a fleet with the remodeled carrier Houshou Kai Ni or land base powered carrier Houshou Kai Ni Sen as flagship along with 3 DD as part of the fleet! Achieve 5 (S Rank) Victories in the same day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Houshou Kai Ni/Sen as flagship, 3 DD, and up to 2 XX, then score 5 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 精鋭第三戦隊、演習開始！Elite 3rd Fleet, Start Exercises!
description: Elite 3rd Fleet exercise Mission: Organize the 3rd Fleet consisting of Haruna Kai Ni B/C, Kongou Kai Ni C, along with 2 destroyers, then take the 3rd Fleet into exercise and score 4 victories (S Ranks) on the same day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Haruna Kai Ni B/C, Kongou Kai Ni C, 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「佐世保の時雨」練度向上を図れ！"Shigure Of Sasebo" Get Rid Of Skill Issue!
description: 「佐世保の時雨」練度向上任務：駆逐艦「時雨」と第二七駆逐隊(白露・有明・夕暮)の僚艦1隻以上を含む演習艦隊で、本日中に演習で【S判定】勝利を5回以上達成せよ！「佐世保の時雨」演習開始！
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shigure, any 1 of: "Shiratsuyu, Ariake, or Yuugure"; and up to 4 XX, then score 5 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 最精鋭！改装「時雨」演習開始！The Most Elite! Improved Shigure Exercises, Commence!
description: 「時雨改三」練度向上任務：改装白露型駆逐艦「時雨改三」を旗艦として、僚艦駆逐艦3隻以上を含む演習艦隊で、本日中に演習で【S判定】勝利を4回以上達成せよ！最精鋭「時雨改三」、演習開始ッ！
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Shigure Kai San as flagship, 3 DD, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「演習」で練度向上！Increase Experience Via "Exercise"!
description: Perform "exercises" three times today with fleets of other commanders!
requirement: Participate in 3 exercise battles within the same day.

title: 「演習」で他提督を圧倒せよ！Overwhelm Other Admirals In "Exercise"!
description: Win 5 times today during "Exercise" with fleets of other commanders!
requirement: Score 5 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 大規模演習Large-Scale Exercises
description: Win 20 times this week during "Exercise" with fleets of other admirals!
requirement: Score 20 B+ ranks in PVP within the same week.

title: 精鋭艦隊演習Elite Fleet Exercise
description: Show our elite fleet's training by winning 7 or more times on the same day during "Exercise"!
requirement: Score 7 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 給糧艦「伊良湖」の支援Support From Supply Ship "Irako"
description: Lake Irago Support Mission
requirement:
Assemble a fleet containing at least 2 CL in the First Fleet, then score 3 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.
Then equip a Secretary with 2 Combat Rations.
notes:
Equipment are consumed upon completion.
Old ID: C16

title: 空母機動部隊、演習始め！Carrier Task Force, Commence Exercises!
description: Carrier Task Force Exercise Mission: Form a carrier task force that contains at least two standard aircraft carriers, one of them as the flagship, as well as two destroyers. Improve the skills of each task force ship! Have the fleet achieve at least 4 victories in exercises within the same day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CV(B/L) as flagship, 1 CV(B/L), 2 DD, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「十八駆」演習！"DesDiv 18" Exercise!
description: Destroyer Division Exercise Mission: Form the 18th Destroyer Division consisting of at least the 4 destroyers "Kasumi", "Arare", "Kagerou", and "Shiranui" in your fleet. Conduct an exercise with this fleet and score 3 victories or more today. Elite DesDiv 18 does not blunder!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, Shiranui, and up to 2 XX, then score 3 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「十九駆」演習！"DesDiv 19" Exercises!
description: Destroyer Exercise Mission: With a fleet including all four of "Isonami", "Uranami", "Ayanami", and "Shikinami", get 3 S Win results in the same day! Elite 19th Destroyer Division, right, just watch!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isonami, Shikinami, Ayanami, Uranami, and up to 2 XX, then score 3 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 小艦艇群演習強化任務Small Ship Exercise Strengthening Mission
description: Organize an exercise fleet consisting of a total of 4 destroyers or coastal defense ships (1 light cruiser can also be used) and with your exercise fleet, complete the exercise with 4 victories (A Rank) or more!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL/DE, 3 DD/DE, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 春季大演習Large Scale Spring Exercise
description: Strive to improve the experience of your fleet by scoring 8 or more victories in a day during "Practice" in the spring season!
requirement: Score 8 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 夏季大演習Large Scale Summer Exercise
description: Strive to improve the experience of your fleet by scoring 8 or more victories in a day during "Practice" in the summer season!
requirement: Score 8 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.
notes:
Old IDs: C24, C36, C45, C59, C67
Should be replaced by Cs5

title: 夏季大演習Large Scale Summer Exercise
description: Strive to improve the experience of your fleet by scoring 8 or more victories in a day during Practice in the summer season!
requirement: Score 8 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 秋季大演習Large Scale Autumn Exercise
description: Strive to improve the experience of your fleet by scoring 8 or more victories in a day during "Practice" in the autumn season!
requirement: Score 8 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.
notes: Old IDs: C10, C26, C40, C47, C61, C69

title: 冬季大演習Large Scale Winter Exercise
description: Strive to improve the experience of your fleet by scoring 8 or more victories in a day during "Practice" in the winter season!
requirement: Score 8 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 演習ティータイム！Tea Time Exercises
description: Organize a fleet in which 4 of the ships include Warspite, Kongou, Ark Royal, Nelson, or any J-class destroyers and proceed to score 4 victories on the same day with your tea time fleet. Tea time is very important you know!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing any 4 from: "Kongou, Warspite, Ark Royal, Nelson, or the J-class"; and up to 2 XX, then score 4 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.
notes:
End quote is from Kongou.
Old ID: C49

title: 最精鋭！主力オブ主力、演習開始！The Cream Of The Crop! Main Force Of The Main Force, Commence Exercises!
description: 10th Destroyer Division Exercise Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of the powerful 10th Destroyer Division consisting of the 4 destroyers: Yuugumo Kai Ni, Makigumo Kai Ni, Kazagumo Kai Ni, and Akigumo Kai Ni. Proceed to score 4 victories on the same day with your fleet.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yuugumo Kai Ni, Makigumo Kai Ni, Kazagumo Kai Ni, Akigumo Kai Ni, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「精鋭軽巡」演習！"Elite Light Cruiser" Exercise!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of 3 light cruisers in the fleet, which includes one as the flagship (excluding torpedo cruisers) and 2 destroyers. With your fleet, score 4 PVP victories (A ranks) within the same day.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CL/CT as flagship, 2 CL/CT, 2 DD, and up to 1 XX, then score 4 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 精鋭「第七駆逐隊」演習開始！Elite "DesDiv 7" Commence Exercise!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of the 4 destroyers Sazanami, Akebono, Ushio, and Oboro along with additional ships and have them participate in exercise and win 3 battles (A rank) on the same day! Elite DesDiv 7 commence exercise!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Sazanami, Akebono, Ushio, Oboro, and up to 2 XX, then score 3 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「巡洋艦戦隊」演習！"Cruiser Squadron" Commence Practice!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of 4 heavy cruisers and 2 destroyers forming a fleet of 6 ships. Then win 5 practice battles on the same day.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing 1 CA(V) as flagship, 3 CA(V), and 2 DD, then score 5 B+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「改装特務空母」任務部隊演習！"Remodeled Utility Carrier" Task Force Exercise!
description: Organize a fleet consisting of "Remodeled Utility Carrier" as flagship along with 2 ships consisting of the "Fletcher-class destroyers" or "John C. Butler destroyer escorts" as part of the fleet. Then with said fleet get 4 S ranks in practice on the same day.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Gambier Bay Mk.II as flagship, any 2 from the: "Fletcher-class or John C. Butler-class"; and up to 3 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 精鋭「第十五駆逐隊」第一小隊演習！Elite "15th DesDiv" 1st Platoon Exercise!
description: Complete 4 (S Rank) Victories on the same day with a fleet consisting of Oyashio Kai Ni and Kuroshio Kai Ni as flagship while the other is the 2nd ship in the fleet.
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Oyashio Kai Ni and Kuroshio Kai Ni with either as flagship and second ship, and up to 4 XX, then score 4 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 精鋭「第十九駆逐隊」演習！Elite "19th Destroyer Div" Exercise!
description: Elite Destroyer Exercise Mission: Organize a fleet consisting of Isonami Kai Ni, Uranami Kai Ni, Ayanami Kai Ni, and Shikinami Kai Ni as part of your fleet. Then proceed to score 3 victories (S Rank) in practice within the same day!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Isonami Kai Ni, Uranami Kai Ni, Ayanami Kai Ni, Shikinami Kai Ni, and up to 2 XX, then score 3 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 「大和型戦艦」第一戦隊演習、始め！"Yamato-class Battleships" Practice Battle For 1st Battle Squadron, Begin!
description: Yamato-class battleship exercise: Form a fleet with the Yamato-clas battleships Yamato and Musashi along with 1 light cruiser and 2 destroyers as part of the fleet and proceed to win 3 battles in practice on the same day
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Yamato, Musashi, 1 CL, 2 DD, and up to 1 XX, then score 3 S ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: 特型初代「第十一駆逐隊」演習スペシャル！Type Special "11th DesDiv Destroyer", Exercises!
description: Destroyer Excercise Mission: Organize a training fleet that includes the 11th Destroyer Division "Fubuki", "Shirayuki", "Hatsuyuki", and "Miyuki". Accomplish A victories or higher 4 times in exercises with the same fleet today! Type Special I Exercise!
requirement: Assemble a fleet containing Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, and Miyuki, and up to 2 XX, then score 4 A+ ranks in PVP within the same day.

title: はじめての「遠征」！Your First "Expedition"
description: Send a fleet on an "Expedition"!
requirement: Send a fleet on an expedition.

title: 第一次潜水艦派遣作戦First Submarine Dispatching Operation
description: Succeed at the Submarine Dispatching Operation!
requirement: Complete expedition 30.

title: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦Second Submarine Dispatching Operation
description: Succeed at the second submarine dispatching operation!
requirement: Complete expedition 30.

title: 潜水艦派遣作戦による技術入手の継続！Continue to Gain Technology Via Submarine Dispatching Operations!
description: Succeed at the third and fourth submarine dispatching operations in order to introduce foreign technology into the fleet!
requirement: Complete expedition 30 twice.

title: 潜水艦派遣による海外艦との接触作戦Operation To Contact Foreign Ships By Dispatching Submarines
description: Succeed at contacting foreign ships via dispatching a strong submarine fleet!
requirement: Complete at expedition 31.
notes: Using Z1 as flagship allows Z3 and Bismarck to be constructed.

title: 航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！Enhance The Usage Of Ships With Aviation Firepower!
description: Carry out "Aviation Battleship Usage Exercise" and enhance the usage of ships with aviation firepower!
requirement: Complete expedition 23.

title: (続)航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！(Continuation) Enhance The Usage Of Ships With Aviation Firepower!
description: Continue to carry out "Aviation Battleship Usage Exercise" and enhance the usage of ships with aviation firepower further!
requirement: Complete expedition 23 three times.

title: 遠洋潜水艦作戦を実施せよ！Carry Out Distant Ocean Submarine Operation!
description: Carry out "Distant Ocean Submarine Operation" to increase the submarine fleet's experience and reduce the enemy fleet!
requirement: Complete expedition 39.

title: 遠洋潜水艦作戦の成果を拡大せよ！Increase The Result Of Distant Ocean Submarine Operation!
description: Continue to carry out "Distant Ocean Submarine Operation" to increase the submarine fleet's experience and reduce the enemy fleet!
requirement: Complete expedition 39 twice.

title: 防空射撃演習を実施せよ！Carry Out Anti-Air Fire Exercise!
description: Carry out "Anti-Air Fire Exercise" multiple times in order to increase the anti-air capability of the fleet!
requirement: Complete expedition 06 three times.

title: 囮機動部隊支援作戦を実施せよ！Carry Out Decoy Mobile Fleet Support Operation!
description: Carry out "Decoy Mobile Fleet Support Operation" and succeed!
requirement: Complete expedition 15.

title: 観艦式予行を実施せよ！Carry Out Naval Review Rehearsal!
description: We will carry out the naval review. As a precursor, perform "Naval Review Rehearsal" multiple times and succeed twice!
requirement: Complete expedition 07 twice.

title: 観艦式を敢行せよ！Carry Out Naval Review!
description: Carry out an actual naval review with a highly experienced fleet. Carry out "Naval Review" and succeed!
requirement: Complete expedition 08.

title: 機動部隊の運用を強化せよ！Strengthen The Carrier Task Force Operations
description: Initiate a Carrier Task Force Expedition, deploy into [Operation MO] and [Enemy Home Port Air Raid Operation], and complete them!
requirement: Complete expeditions 26 and 35.

title: 潜水艦派遣作戦による航空機技術入手Obtain Airplane Technology From Submarine Dispatch Operation
