description: Deploy a Submarine Dispatch Operation to obtain new Plane Technology!
requirement: Complete expeditions 30 and 31.
notes: The quest will be displayed as 50% complete if Expedition 30 is completed first, and as 80% complete if Expedition 31 is completed first.

title: 潜水艦派遣作戦による噴式技術の入手Obtain Jet Engine Technology From Submarine Dispatch Operation
description: Prepare 5 000 steel and 1 500 bauxite to bring in the new Jet Engine Technology through a Submarine Dispatch Operation.
requirement: Complete expeditions 30 and 31, and prepare 5 000 steel and 1 500 bauxite.

title: 海上護衛総隊、遠征開始！To All Surface Escort Fleets, Commence The Expeditions!
description: Expedition Mission: Conduct Expedition Missions "Anti-Submarine Patrol Mission", "Maritime Escort Mission", "Tanker Escort Mission" and complete them using light cruisers, destroyers, and escorts!
requirement: Complete expeditions 04, 05, and 09.

title: 遠征「補給」支援体制を強化せよ！Strengthen The Expedition "Supply" Support System!
description: Strengthen the Expedition "Supply" Support System: Prepare 800 steel and carry out the expedition "Supply Reinforcement Mission". Complete the expedition and provide the following supplies to provide "Supply support" to your expedition fleets.
requirement: Complete expedition A1, and prepare 800 steel.

title: 「捷一号作戦」、発動準備！Making Preparations For "Operation Shou-Gou 1"!
description: Operation Sho-Go 1 Planning Mission: Carry out the expeditions "Defense Mission", "Supply Line Strengthening Mission" and "South Western Air Reconnaissance Operation ". Complete each of them to prepare for the Operation down to the Southwest.
requirement: Complete expeditions 03, A1, and B1.

title: 「海防艦」、進発せよ！"Coastal Defense Ships", Head Out!
description: Surface Escort Mission: Complete the expedition missions "Supply Line Strengthening Mission", "Strait Defense Line", "Maritime Escort Mission" and "Tanker Escort Mission" with escort vessels consisting mainly of coastal defense ships and destroyers!
requirement: Complete expeditions 05, 09, A1, and A2.

title: 艦隊司令部の強化 【準備段階】Fleet Headquarters Improvements [Preparation Phase]
description: Fleet Headquarters Improvement Mission: Complete expeditions 17, A2, B1 & A1 with the help of coastal defense ships, torpedo squadrons, seaplane tenders, etc.!
requirement: Complete expeditions 17, A1, A2, and B1.

title: 警備及び哨戒偵察を強化せよ！Reinforce Our Defenses As Well As Reconnaissance!
description: Defense Patrol Mission: Conduct the expeditions: Strait Defense Line, Reinforcement Reconnaissance Mission, and the South Western Air Reconnaissance Operation to secure and patrol the mainland and Nansei Islands in preparation for the Southern Front Line Expeditions!
requirement: Complete expeditions A2, 10, and B1.

title: 南方戦線遠征を実施せよ！Carry Out An Expedition To The Southern Front!
description: Southern Front Expedition: Conduct a Southern Operation expedition that supports the operations in the Southern Seas area. Conduct the Southern Waters Expeditions: Tokyo Express, Tokyo Express 2, Seaplane Base Construction, Seaplane Front Line Transport, and Operation MO.
requirement: Complete expeditions 35, 36, 37, 38, and 40.

title: 西方連絡作戦による航空技術獲得Acquisition Of Aircraft Technology By Establishing Contact With The West
description: Western Contact Operation: Perform Multiple Submarine Dispatch Operations using several submarines and obtain the aircraft technology from Friendly European Forces and complete them.
requirement: Complete expedition 30 twice.

title: 航空基地を整備拡張せよ！Development And Expansion Of Your Land Base!
description: Land Base Expansion Mission: Conduct the following expeditions: Maritime Escort Mission, Tanker Escort Mission, Supply Line Strengthening Mission, Aircraft Transport Operation, Seaplane Base Construction, Seaplane Frontline Transport, and Bauxite Escort Convoy. Complete each task.
requirement: Complete expeditions 05, A1, 09, 18, 36, 40, and 45.

title: 【作戦準備】第一段階任務（対潜整備）[Operation Preparation] First Stage Mission (Anti-Submarine Maintenance)
description: "Operation Preparation" First Stage Mission: Perform the Expeditions "Defense Mission", "Anti Submarine Mission", Maritime Escort Mission, "Supply Line Strengthening Mission", and "Strait Defense Line" and complete them all at least once.
requirement: Complete expeditions 03, 04, 05, A1, and A2.

title: 海上輸送航路の護衛強化Strengthening Escort For The Maritime Transport Routes
description: Strengthening escort for the maritime transport mission: Complete Expeditions, Anti Submarine Mission, Maritime Escort Mission, Tanker Escort Mission, Logistics Strengthing Mission, and South Western Seaplane Reconnaissance Operation and complete all of them once.
requirement: Complete expeditions 04, 05, 09, A1, and B1.

title: 「遠征」を3回成功させよう！Succeed In 3 "Expeditions"!
description: Succeed in 3 "Expeditions" today!
requirement: Complete 3 expeditions within the same day.

title: 「遠征」を10回成功させよう！Succeed In 10 "Expeditions"!
description: Succeed in 10 "Expeditions" today!
requirement: Complete 10 expeditions within the same day.

title: 大規模遠征作戦、発令！Order For Large-Scale Expedition Operation!
description: Succeed in 30 "Expeditions" this week!
requirement: Complete 30 expeditions within the same week.

title: 南方への輸送作戦を成功させよ！Succeed In Transport Operation To The South!
description: Perform a "Tokyo Express"-type expedition to the conflict-ridden Southern Sea Region and be successful!
requirement: Complete either expedition 37 or 38 within the week.

title: 南方への鼠輸送を継続実施せよ!Continue To Carry Out Nezumi Transport To The South!
description: Continue to perform "Tokyo Express"-type expeditions this week and be successful 6 times!!
requirement: Complete either expedition 37 or/and 38, 6 more times within the same week.

title: 輸送船団護衛を強化せよ！Reinforce The Transport Escort Fleet!
description: Do your duty as an escort fleet and repeat the "Maritime Escort Mission"!
requirement: Complete expedition 05, 4 times

title: 海上通商航路の警戒を厳とせよ！Perform Strict Surveillance Of The Maritime Trade Route!
description: Expedition Mission: Perform the Expeditions, Defense Mission, Anti-Submarine Patrol Mission, Maritime Escort Mission, and Force Reconnaissance Mission to gain control over the enemy trade destruction forces and to secure a maritime Trade Route.
requirement: Complete expeditions 03, 04, 05, and 10.

title: 近海に侵入する敵潜を制圧せよ！Gain Control Of The Coastal Waters From The Invading Enemy Submarine Forces!
description: Enemy Submarine Control Mission: Carry out Anti-Submarine Patrol, Strait Guard Action, and Long Term Anti-Submarine Patrol multiple times respectively to gain control of the enemy submarine forces entering the coastal waters and strike them out of our territorial waters!
requirement: Complete expeditions 04, A2, and A3 twice each.

title: 特設護衛船団司令部、活動開始！Establishing The Special Escort Convoy Headquarters!
description: Carry out the Defense Mission, Maritime Escort Mission, Supply Line Strengthening Mission, Strait Defense Line, and the Tanker Escort Mission with fleets primarily composed of escort vessels such as escort ships and destroyers.
requirement: Complete expeditions 03, 05, 09, A1, and A2.

title: 練習航海及び警備任務を実施せよ！Conduct A Practice Voyage And Surveillance Mission!
description: Practice Voyage and Surveillance Mission: Conduct the expedition of a voyage practice, long-distance voyage practice, defense mission, anti-submarine patrol, and an Enforced Reconnaissance Mission using your destroyers, cruisers, and coastal defense ships.
requirement: Complete expeditions 01, 02, 03, 04, and 10.

title: 小笠原沖哨戒線の強化を実施せよ！Strengthen The Ogasawara Coastal Patrol Line!
description: Ogasawara Coastal Mission: Perform the anti-submarine patrol, Ogasawara Coastal Patrol Line, Ogasawara Coastal Combat Patrol, and the Southwest Air Reconnaissance Operations with destroyers and light cruisers and succeed!
requirement: Complete expeditions 04, A5, A6, and B1.

title: 南西諸島方面の海上護衛を強化せよ！Reinforce Our Maritime Escorts In The Nansei Islands Area!
description: Maritime Escort Mission: Perform various expeditions such as "Supply Line Strengthening Mission", "Anti-Submarine Mission ", "Tanker Escort Mission", and "Nansei Island Search and Destroy Mission" and succeed!
requirement: Complete expeditions A1, 04, 09, and B5.

title: 兵站強化遠征任務【基本作戦】Military Buildup Expedition Mission [Basic Operation]
description: Logistics Strengthening Expedition Missions: Perform and succeed in each of the "Maritime Escort Mission", "Supply Line Strengthening Missions", "Bauxite Transport Missions", and "Southwestern Air Reconnaissance Operations"!
requirement: Complete expeditions 05, A1, 11, and B1.

title: 兵站強化遠征任務【拡張作戦】Military Buildup Expedition Mission [Extra Operation]
description: Logistics Strengthening Expedition Missions: Perform and succeed in each of the "Maritime Escort Mission", "Brunei Anchorage Patrol", "Seaplane Front Line Transport" and "Southwestern Air Reconnaissance Operations"!
requirement: Complete expeditions 05, 41, 40, 46, and E2.

title: 西方連絡作戦準備を実施せよ！Preparation for Western Contact Operation!
description: Complete the expeditions Western Sea Reconnaissance Operations, Submarine Dispatch Exercise, Submarine Dispatch Operation, and Contact with Friendly European Forces and complete them.
requirement: Complete expeditions 29, 30, D1, and D3.

title: 新兵装開発資材輸送を船団護衛せよ！Escort The Convoy To Transport New Weapons Development Materials!
description: Conduct the following expeditions: Maritime Escort Mission, Tanker Escort Mission, Bauxite Transport Mission, Resource Transport Mission, and South Western Air Reconnaissance Operation. Complete each task.
requirement: Complete expeditions 05, 09, 11, 12, and B1.

title: はじめての「補給」！Your First "Resupply"!
description: Resupply is important! "Resupply" fuel and ammo to a ship!
requirement: Resupply a ship.

title: はじめての「入渠」！Your First "Docking"!
description: Repair a ship damaged in battle by "Docking" to prepare for the next sortie!
requirement: Put a ship in the repair dock.

title: 艦隊大整備！Large-Scale Fleet Checkup!
description: Put 5 or more ships from different fleets into the docks for a large-scale checkup!
requirement: Put 5 ships in the repair dock.

title: 艦隊酒保祭り！Fleet Bartender's Festival!
description: Fleet Bartenders are having a festival! Perform resupply 15 or more times to ships!
requirement: Resupply ships 15 times.
notes:
Old ID: E4
It is possible to resupply fuel, ammo, and planes, separately per ship.

title: はじめての「建造」！Your First "Construction"!
description: Construct a ship at the factory using resources such as steel!
requirement: Construct 1 ship.

title: はじめての「開発」！Your First "Development"!
description: Develop a new equipment at the factory using resources such as bauxite!
requirement: Develop 1 Equipment.

title: はじめての「解体」！Your First "Dismantling"!
description: Dismantle a ship you don't need at the factory!
requirement: Dismantle 1 ship.
